<DIV style="margin-top: 18pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">US
    Airways, Inc.<BR>
    </FONT></B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Notes to
    Consolidated Financial
    Statements&#160;&#151;&#160;(Continued)</FONT></B>
</DIV>
<DIV style="margin-top: 18pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    to the market price of the underlying shares of US Airways
    Group&#146;s common stock on the date of grant if vesting is
    based on a service or a performance condition. The grant-date
    fair value of RSU awards that are subject to both a service and
    a performance condition are being expensed over the vesting
    period, as the performance condition has been met. Vesting
    periods for RSU awards range from three to four years. RSUs are
    classified as equity awards.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    As of December&#160;31, 2008, there were $8&#160;million of
    total unrecognized compensation costs related to RSUs. These
    costs are expected to be recognized over a weighted average
    period of 1.1&#160;years. The total fair value of RSUs vested
    during 2008, 2007 and 2006 was $3&#160;million, $14&#160;million
    and $3&#160;million, respectively.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <I>Stock Options and Stock Appreciation Rights</I>&#160;&#151;
    Stock options and stock appreciation rights (&#147;SARs&#148;)
    are granted with an exercise price equal to the fair market
    value of US Airways Group&#146;s common stock at the date of
    each grant, generally become exercisable over a three to four
    year period and expire if unexercised at the end of their term,
    which ranges from seven to ten years. Stock options and SARs are
    classified as equity awards. The exercise of SARs will be
    settled with the issuance of shares of US Airways Group&#146;s
    common stock.
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <BR>
    162
</DIV><!-- END PAGE WIDTH -->

</TD>
<TD nowrap align="right" valign="bottom">
    &#151;
</TD>
<TD nowrap align="left" valign="bottom">
&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    The fair value of stock options and SARs is determined at the
    grant date using a Black-Scholes option pricing model, which
    requires several assumptions. The risk-free interest rate is
    based on the U.S.&#160;Treasury yield curve in effect for the
    expected term of the stock option or SAR at the time of grant.
    The dividend yield is assumed to be zero since US Airways Group
    does not pay dividends and has no current plans to do so in the
    future. The volatility is based on the historical volatility of
    US Airways Group&#146;s common stock over a time period equal to
    the expected term of the stock option or SAR. The expected life
    of stock options and SARs is based on the historical experience
    of US Airways Group.
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    164
</DIV><!-- END PAGE WIDTH -->

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    As of December&#160;31, 2008, there were $20&#160;million of
    total unrecognized compensation costs related to stock options
    and SARs. These costs are expected to be recognized over a
    weighted average period of 1.3&#160;years.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    The total intrinsic value of stock options and SARs exercised
    during the years ended December&#160;31, 2008, 2007 and 2006 was
    $0.1&#160;million, $4&#160;million and $68&#160;million,
    respectively. Cash received from stock option and SAR exercises
    during the years ended December&#160;31, 2008, 2007 and 2006 was
    $0.1&#160;million, $2&#160;million and $31&#160;million,
    respectively.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <I>Agreements with the Air Line Pilots Association
    (&#147;ALPA&#148;)</I>&#160;&#151; US Airways Group and US
    Airways have a letter of agreement with ALPA, the US
    Airways&#146; pilot union through April&#160;18, 2008, that
    provides that US Airways&#146; pilots designated by ALPA receive
    stock options to purchase 1.1&#160;million shares of US Airways
    Group&#146;s common stock. The first tranche of 500,000 stock
    options was granted on January&#160;31, 2006 with an exercise
    price of $33.65. The second tranche of 300,000 stock options was
    granted on January&#160;31, 2007 with an exercise price of
    $56.90. The third and final tranche of 300,000 stock options was
    granted on January&#160;31, 2008 with an exercise price of
    $12.50. The stock options granted to ALPA pilots do not reduce
    the shares available for grant under any equity incentive plan.
    Any of these ALPA stock options that are forfeited or that
    expire without being exercised will not become available for
    grant under any of US Airways&#146; plans.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    The per share fair value of the ALPA pilot stock options and
    assumptions used for the January&#160;31, 2008, 2007 and 2006
    grants were as follows:
</DIV>

</TR>
</TABLE>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    As of December&#160;31, 2008, there were no unrecognized
    compensation costs related to stock options granted to ALPA
    pilots as the stock options were fully vested on the grant date.
    No ALPA stock options were exercised in 2008. There were 25,029
    and 315,390 ALPA stock options exercised during 2007 and 2006,
    respectively, pursuant to this agreement. The total intrinsic
    value of ALPA stock options exercised during 2007 and 2006 was
    $1&#160;million and $5&#160;million, respectively. Cash received
    from ALPA stock options exercised during the years ended
    December&#160;31, 2007 and 2006 totaled $1&#160;million and
    $10&#160;million, respectively.
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <BR>
    165
</DIV><!-- END PAGE WIDTH -->

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

<TR>
    <TD width="5%"></TD>
    <TD width="95%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD>
    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">16.&#160;&#160;</FONT></B>
</TD>
    <TD>
    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Subsequent
    events</FONT></B>
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    On January&#160;15, 2009, US Airways flight 1549 was involved in
    an accident in New York that resulted in the aircraft landing in
    the Hudson River. The Airbus A320 aircraft was en route to
    Charlotte from LaGuardia with 150 passengers and a crew of 5 (2
    pilots and 3 flight attendants) onboard. All aboard survived and
    there were no serious
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <BR>
    166
</DIV><!-- END PAGE WIDTH -->
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always"><A HREF="#tocpage">Table of Contents</A></H5><P>

<DIV style="width: 87%; margin-left: 6%"><!-- BEGIN PAGE WIDTH -->

<DIV style="margin-top: 18pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">US
    Airways, Inc.<BR>
    </FONT></B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Notes to
    Consolidated Financial
    Statements&#160;&#151;&#160;(Continued)</FONT></B>
</DIV>
<DIV style="margin-top: 18pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    injuries. US Airways has insurance coverage for this aircraft
    (which is a total loss) as well as costs resulting from the
    accident, and there are no applicable deductibles.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    On January&#160;16, 2009, US Airways exercised its right to
    obtain new loan commitments and incur additional loans under the
    spare parts loan agreement. In connection with the exercise of
    that right, Airbus Financial Services funded $50&#160;million in
    satisfaction of a previous commitment. This loan will mature on
    October&#160;20, 2014, will bear interest at a rate of LIBOR
    plus a margin and will be secured by the collateral securing
    loans under the spare parts loan agreement. In addition, in
    connection with the incurrence of this loan, US Airways and
    Airbus entered into amendments to the A320 Family Aircraft
    Purchase Agreement, the A330 Aircraft Purchase Agreement and the
    A350 XWB Purchase Agreement. Pursuant to these amendments, the
    existing cross-default provisions of the applicable aircraft
    purchase agreements were amended and restated to, among other
    things, specify the circumstances under which a default under
    the loan would constitute a default under the applicable
    aircraft purchase agreement.
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <BR>
    167
</DIV><!-- END PAGE WIDTH -->
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always"><A HREF="#tocpage">Table of Contents</A></H5><P>

<DIV style="width: 87%; margin-left: 6%"><!-- BEGIN PAGE WIDTH -->

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

<TR>
    <TD width="8%"></TD>
    <TD width="92%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD>
    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Item&#160;9.<I>&#160;&#160;</I></FONT></B>
</TD>
    <TD>
    <A name='115'></A><B><I><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Changes
    in and Disagreements with Accountants on Accounting and
    Financial Disclosure</FONT></I></B>
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    None.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

<TR>
    <TD width="9%"></TD>
    <TD width="91%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD>
    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Item&#160;9A.<I>&#160;&#160;</I></FONT></B>
</TD>
    <TD>
    <A name='116'></A><B><I><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Controls
    and Procedures</FONT></I></B>
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    Section&#160;404 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 requires
    management to include in this Annual Report on
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Form&#160;10-K</FONT>
    a report on management&#146;s assessment of the effectiveness of
    US Airways Group&#146;s and US Airways&#146; internal control
    over financial reporting, as well as an attestation report from
    US Airways Group&#146;s and US Airways&#146; independent
    registered public accounting firm on the effectiveness of US
    Airways Group&#146;s and US Airways&#146; internal control over
    financial reporting. Management&#146;s annual report on internal
    control over financial reporting and the related attestation
    report from US Airways Group&#146;s and US Airways&#146;
    independent registered public accounting firm are located in
    Item&#160;8A. &#147;Consolidated Financial Statements and
    Supplementary Data of US Airways Group, Inc.&#148; and
    Item&#160;8B. &#147;Consolidated Financial Statements and
    Supplementary Data of US Airways, Inc.&#148; and are
    incorporated herein by reference.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Disclosure
    Controls and Procedures</FONT></B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    An evaluation was performed under the supervision and with the
    participation of US Airways Group&#146;s and US Airways&#146;
    management, including the Chief Executive Officer (the
    &#147;CEO&#148;) and Chief Financial Officer (the
    &#147;CFO&#148;), of the effectiveness of the design and
    operation of our disclosure controls and procedures (as defined
    in the rules promulgated under the Exchange Act) as of
    December&#160;31, 2008. Based on that evaluation, our
    management, including the CEO and CFO, concluded that our
    disclosure controls and procedures were effective as of
    December&#160;31, 2008.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Changes
    in Internal Control over Financial Reporting</FONT></B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    There has been no change to US Airways Group&#146;s or US
    Airways&#146; internal control over financial reporting that
    occurred during the quarter ended December&#160;31, 2008 that
    has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially
    affect, US Airways Group&#146;s or US Airways&#146; internal
    control over financial reporting.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Limitation
    on the Effectiveness of Controls</FONT></B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    We believe that a controls system, no matter how well designed
    and operated, cannot provide absolute assurance that the
    objectives of the controls system are met and no evaluation of
    controls can provide absolute assurance that all control issues
    and instances of fraud, if any, within a company have been
    detected. Our disclosure controls and procedures are designed to
    provide reasonable assurance of achieving their objectives, and
    the CEO and CFO believe that our disclosure controls and
    procedures were effective at the &#147;reasonable
    assurance&#148; level as of December&#160;31, 2008.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

<TR>
    <TD width="9%"></TD>
    <TD width="91%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD>
    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Item&#160;9B.<I>&#160;&#160;</I></FONT></B>
</TD>
    <TD>
    <A name='117'></A><B><I><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Other
    Information</FONT></I></B>
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    On February&#160;17, 2009, we entered into an amendment to our
    co-branded credit card agreement with Barclays Bank Delaware.
    The amendment reduced the unrestricted cash balance condition to
    Barclays&#146; on-going obligation under the agreement to
    pre-purchase additional miles on a monthly basis to
    $1.4&#160;billion for January 2009 and $1.45&#160;billion for
    February 2009, with the balance in each case including certain
    fuel hedge collateral. The reductions addressed the impact on
    our unrestricted cash of our obligations to post significant
    amounts of collateral with our fuel hedging counterparties due
    to recent rapid declines in fuel prices.
</DIV>
<A name='118'>
<DIV style="margin-top: 18pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">PART&#160;III</FONT></B>
</DIV>
</A>
<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    The information required by Part&#160;III of this
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Form&#160;10-K,</FONT>
    pursuant to General Instruction&#160;G(3) of
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Form&#160;10-K,</FONT>
    will be set forth in US Airways Group&#146;s definitive Proxy
    Statement to be filed pursuant to Regulation&#160;14A relating
    to US Airways Group&#146;s Annual Meeting of Stockholders on
    June&#160;10, 2009 and is incorporated herein by reference. US
    Airways Group will, within 120&#160;days of the end of its
    fiscal year, file with the SEC a definitive proxy statement
    pursuant to Regulation&#160;14A.
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    <BR>
    168

    <TD width="9%"></TD>
    <TD width="91%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD>
    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Item&#160;10.<I>&#160;&#160;</I></FONT></B>
</TD>
    <TD>
    <A name='119'></A><B><I><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Directors,
    Executive Officers and Corporate Governance</FONT></I></B>
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    Information regarding US Airways Group&#146;s and US
    Airways&#146; directors and executive officers required by this
    Item will be set forth under the caption
    &#147;Proposal&#160;1&#160;&#151; Election of Directors,&#148;
    &#147;Executive Officers,&#148; &#147;Section&#160;16(a)
    Beneficial Ownership Reporting Compliance&#148; and
    &#147;Information About Our Board of Directors and Corporate
    Governance&#148; in US Airways Group&#146;s definitive Proxy
    Statement and is incorporated by reference into this Annual
    Report on
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Form&#160;10-K.</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    US Airways Group has adopted a Code of Business Conduct and
    Ethics (&#147;Code&#148;) within the meaning of Item&#160;406(b)
    of
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Regulation&#160;S-K.</FONT>
    The Code applies to the officers, directors and employees of US
    Airways Group and its subsidiaries. The Code, US Airways
    Group&#146;s Corporate Governance Guidelines and the charters of
    our Board committees are publicly available on US Airways
    Group&#146;s website at <I>www.usairways.com. </I>Printed copies
    of the Code, the Corporate Governance Guidelines and the
    charters of the Board committees are available at no charge to
    any stockholder upon request to our Corporate Secretary at US
    Airways, 111&#160;West Rio Salado Parkway, Tempe, Arizona 85281.
    If US Airways Group makes substantive amendments to the Code or
    grants any waiver, including any implicit waiver, to its
    principal executive officer, principal financial officer,
    principal accounting officer or controller, and persons
    performing similar functions, US Airways Group will disclose the
    nature of such amendment or waiver on its website or in a
    Current Report on
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Form&#160;8-K</FONT>
    in accordance with applicable rules and regulations. The
    information contained on or connected to US Airways Group&#146;s
    website is not incorporated by reference into this
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Form&#160;10-K</FONT>
    and should not be considered part of this or any other report
    that US Airways Group files or furnishes with the SEC.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    US Airways Group&#146;s stock is listed on the NYSE. As a
    result, its Chief Executive Officer is required to make and will
    make a CEO&#146;s Annual Certification to the New York Stock
    Exchange in accordance with Section&#160;303A.12 of the New York
    Stock Exchange Listed Company Manual stating that he was not
    aware of any violations by US Airways Group of the NYSE
    corporate governance listing standards.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

<TR>
    <TD width="9%"></TD>
    <TD width="91%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD>
    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Item&#160;11.<I>&#160;&#160;</I></FONT></B>
</TD>
    <TD>
    <A name='120'></A><B><I><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Executive
    Compensation</FONT></I></B>
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    Information required by this Item will be set forth in US
    Airways Group&#146;s definitive Proxy Statement under the
    captions &#147;Information About Our Board of Directors and
    Corporate Governance,&#148; &#147;Executive Compensation&#148;
    and &#147;Director Compensation&#148; in the definitive Proxy
    Statement and is incorporated by reference into this Annual
    Report on
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Form&#160;10-K.</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

<TR>
    <TD width="9%"></TD>
    <TD width="91%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD>
    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Item&#160;12.<I>&#160;&#160;</I></FONT></B>
</TD>
    <TD>
    <A name='121'></A><B><I><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Security
    Ownership of Certain Beneficial Owners and Management and
    Related Stockholder Matters</FONT></I></B>
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    Information required by this Item will be set forth in US
    Airways Group&#146;s definitive Proxy Statement under the
    captions &#147;Security Ownership of Certain Beneficial Owners
    and Management&#148; and &#147;Equity Compensation Plan
    Information&#148; in the Proxy Statement and is incorporated by
    reference into this Annual Report on
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Form&#160;10-K.</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">

<TR>
    <TD width="9%"></TD>
    <TD width="91%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD>
    <B><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Item&#160;13.<I>&#160;&#160;</I></FONT></B>
</TD>
    <TD>
    <A name='122'></A><B><I><FONT style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times">Certain
    Relationships and Related Transactions and Director
    Independence</FONT></I></B>
</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    Information required by this Item will be set forth in US
    Airways Group&#146;s definitive Proxy Statement under the
    captions &#147;Certain Relationships and Related Party
    Transactions&#148; and &#147;Information About Our Board of
    Directors and Corporate Governance&#148; in the Proxy Statement
    and is incorporated by reference into this Annual Report on
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Form&#160;10-K.</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 12pt; font-size: 1pt">&nbsp;</DIV>

    Information required by this Item will be set forth in US

    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Form&#160;10-K.</FONT>

    Exhibits required to be filed by Item&#160;601 of
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Regulation&#160;S-K.</FONT>
    Where the amount of securities authorized to be issued under any
    of the Company&#146;s long-term debt agreements does not exceed
    10&#160;percent of the Company&#146;s assets, pursuant to
    paragraph (b)(4)(iii) of Item&#160;601 of
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Regulation&#160;S-K,</FONT>
    in lieu of filing such as an exhibit, the Company hereby agrees
    to furnish to the Commission upon request a copy of any
    agreement with respect to such long-term debt.

<DIV align="left" style="margin-left: 0%; margin-right: 0%; text-indent: 4%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times; color: #000000; background: #FFFFFF">
    KNOW ALL MEN BY THESE PRESENTS, that each individual whose
    signature appears below constitutes and appoints W. Douglas
    Parker and Derek J. Kerr and each or any of them, his or her
    true and lawful attorneys and agents, with full power of
    substitution and resubstitution, for him or her and in his or
    her name, place and stead, in any and all capacities, to sign
    any and all amendments to the Registrants&#146; Annual Report on
    <FONT style="white-space: nowrap">Form&#160;10-K</FONT>
    for the fiscal year ended December&#160;31, 2008, and to file
    the same with all exhibits thereto, and all other documents in
    connection therewith, with the Securities and Exchange
    Commission, granting unto said attorneys and agents, and each or
    any of them, full power and authority to do and perform each and
    every act and thing requisite and necessary to be done, as fully
    to all intents and purposes as he or she might or could do in
    person, hereby ratifying and confirming all that said attorneys
    and agents, and each of them, or his substitute or substitutes,
    may lawfully do or cause to be done by virtue hereof.
</DIV>

<HTML>
<HEAD>
<TITLE>exv10w5</TITLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY bgcolor="#FFFFFF">
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>Exhibit&nbsp;10.5</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">Amendment No.&nbsp;2
</DIV>


<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">to the

</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Amended and Restated Airbus A320 Family Aircraft Purchase Agreement

</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">dated as of October&nbsp;2, 2007

</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">between

</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">AIRBUS S.A.S.

</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">and

</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">US AIRWAYS, INC.

</DIV>
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">This Amendment No.&nbsp;2 to the Amended and Restated Airbus A320 Family Aircraft Purchase Agreement
between Airbus S.A.S. and US Airways, Inc. (the &#147;<U>Amendment</U>&#148;) is entered into as of October
20, 2008, by and between Airbus S.A.S., a <I>soci&#233;t&#233; par actions simplifi&#233;e, </I>organized and existing
under the laws of the Republic of France, having its registered office located at 1, rond-point
Maurice Bellonte, 31700 Blagnac, France (the &#147;<U>Seller</U>&#148;), and US Airways, Inc., a corporation
organized and existing under the laws of the State of Delaware, United States of America, having
its principal corporate offices located at 111 West Rio Salado Parkway, Tempe, Arizona 85281,
U.S.A.(the &#147;<U>Buyer</U>&#148;);
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">WITNESSETH:
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">WHEREAS, the Buyer and the Seller have entered into an Amended and Restated Airbus A320 Family
Purchase Agreement, dated as of October&nbsp;2, 2007, which agreement, as previously amended by and
supplemented with all Exhibits, Appendices, Letter Agreements and amendments, including Amendment
No.&nbsp;1 executed on January&nbsp;11, 2008 (the &#147;<U>Agreement</U>&#148;) relates to the sale by the Seller and
the purchase by the Buyer of certain Airbus single-aisle aircraft;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">WHEREAS, the Seller has proposed to the Buyer that in exchange for the agreement of the Buyer to
amend, among other things, certain provisions of the Aggregate Agreements (as hereinafter
defined)**;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">WHEREAS, the amendments referred to above are set forth in this Amendment by and between the Seller
and the Buyer dated as of even date herewith (&#147;<U>Amendment No.&nbsp;2</U>&#148;), the Amended and Restated
Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;3 to the Agreement dated as of even date herewith (&#147;<U>Amended and Restated
Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;3</U>&#148;), the Amended and Restated Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;5 to the Agreement,
dated as of even date herewith (&#147;<U>Amended and Restated Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;5</U>&#148;) and the
Amended and Restated Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;9 to the Agreement, dated as of even date herewith
(&#147;<U>Amended and Restated Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;9</U>&#148;);
</DIV>



<DIV align="left">
<DIV style="font-size: 3pt; margin-top: 16pt; width: 18%; border-top: 1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</DIV>
</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">
<TR>
    <TD width="3%"></TD>
    <TD width="1%"></TD>
    <TD width="96"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD nowrap align="left">**</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Confidential Treatment Requested.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>


<DIV align="center">
<TABLE style="font-size: 10pt" cellspacing="0" border="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%">
<!-- Begin Table Head -->
<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD width="47%"></TD>
    <TD width="5%"></TD>
    <TD width="47%"></TD>
</TR>
<!-- End Table Head -->
<!-- Begin Table Body -->
<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD align="left" valign="top">USA &#151; Amendment No.&nbsp;2 to</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="right" valign="top">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD align="left" valign="top">Amended and Restated Airbus A320 Family Purchase Agreement</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="right" valign="top">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD align="left" valign="top">Execution
</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="center" valign="top"></TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD align="left" valign="top">081020-CT0803167-AMD2-USA-A320
</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="RIGHT" valign="top"><I>PRIVILEGED AND CONFIDENTIAL</I></TD>
</TR>
<!-- End Table Body -->
</TABLE>
</DIV>


<P align="RIGHT" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->Page 1 of 6<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">




<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">WHEREAS, the Buyer is willing to enter into (A)&nbsp;this Amendment, Amended and Restated Letter
Agreement No.&nbsp;3, Amended and Restated Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;5 and Amended and Restated Letter
Agreement No.&nbsp;9, (B)&nbsp;Amendment No.&nbsp;2 to the Airbus A330 Aircraft Purchase Agreement dated as even
date herewith, (C)&nbsp;Amendment No.&nbsp;1 to the Amended and Restated Airbus A350 XWB Purchase Agreement
dated as of even date herewith, (D)** and (E)** (collectively the &#147;<U>Aggregate
Agreements</U>&#148;)**;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">WHEREAS, the Buyer and the Seller agree and acknowledge that such amendments ** are an adjustment
to the commercial terms set forth in the Agreement and are not intended to be**;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">WHEREAS the Buyer and the Seller agree and acknowledge that such amendments to the commercial terms
set forth in the Agreement are intended**; and
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">WHEREAS, the Buyer and the Seller acknowledge that immediately upon execution of this Amendment,
concurrently with the execution of the above referenced amendments, the Seller will**;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">NOW, THEREFORE, IT IS AGREED AS FOLLOWS:
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Capitalized terms used herein and not otherwise defined in this Amendment will have the meanings
assigned to them in the Agreement. The terms &#147;herein,&#148; &#147;hereof,&#148; and &#147;hereunder&#148; and words of
similar import refer to this Amendment.
</DIV>

    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="5%" nowrap align="left">22.15</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>Asset Covenants</U></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">22.15.1</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The Buyer shall not sell, transfer, convey, assign or otherwise dispose of any of
its properties or other assets or operated Airbus aircraft to the extent any such
disposition (i)&nbsp;materially impairs the business or operations of the Buyer, (ii)
materially changes the nature of the Buyer&#146;s business, (iii)&nbsp;constitutes a disposition
of a substantial portion of the Buyer&#146;s assets or (iv)&nbsp;constitutes a disposition of a
substantial portion of the Buyer&#146;s Airbus aircraft fleet in-service as of the date
hereof.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">22.15.2</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#147;Minimum Unrestricted Cash. The Buyer will not permit the aggregate amount of
Unrestricted Cash (as hereinafter defined) to be less than required in the Citi Loan
Agreement from time to time or any successor agreement or facility thereof, **.&#148;</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#147;<U>Unrestricted Cash</U>&#148; means cash and Cash Equivalents (as hereinafter
defined) of the Buyer, its parent and affiliates that (i)&nbsp;may be classified, in
accordance with GAAP, as &#147;unrestricted&#148; on the consolidated balance sheets of the
Buyer&#146;s parent or (ii)&nbsp;may be qualified, in accordance with GAAP, as &#147;restricted&#148;
on the consolidated balance sheets of the Buyer&#146;s parent solely in favor of the
administrative agent and any lenders</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>pursuant to the Citi Loan Agreement and the related loan documents (or any
amendment, replacement or refinancing thereof).</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#147;<U>Cash Equivalents</U>&#148; means, as at any date of determination, (i)&nbsp;marketable
securities (a)&nbsp;issued or directly and unconditionally guaranteed as to interest
and principal by the United States government or (b)&nbsp;issued by any agency or
instrumentality of the United States the obligations of which are backed by the
full faith and credit of the United States, in each case maturing within one year
after such date; (ii)&nbsp;marketable direct obligations issued by any state of the
United States of America or any political subdivision of any such state or any
instrumentality thereof, in each case maturing within one year after such date
and having, at the time of the acquisition thereof, the highest rating obtainable
from either S&#038;P or Moody&#146;s; (iii)&nbsp;commercial paper not issued by the Buyer&#146;s
parent maturing no more than one year after such date and having, at the time of
the acquisition thereof, a rating of at least A-2 from S&#038;P or at least P-2 from
Moody&#146;s; (iv)&nbsp;certificates of deposit or bankers&#146; acceptances maturing within one
year after such date and issued or accepted by any Eligible Lender (as
hereinafter defined) or by any commercial bank organized under the laws of the
United States of America or any state thereof or the District of Columbia that
(a)&nbsp;is at least &#147;adequately capitalized&#148; (as defined in the regulations of its
primary Federal banking regulator) and (b)&nbsp;has Tier 1 capital (as defined in such
regulations) of not less than $500,000,000 (US dollars &#151; five hundred million);
(v)&nbsp;shares of any money market mutual fund that (a)&nbsp;has at least 95% of its
assets invested continuously in the types of investments referred to in clauses
(i)&nbsp;and (ii)&nbsp;above, (b)&nbsp;has net assets of not less than $500,000,000 (US dollars
 &#151; five hundred million), and (c)&nbsp;has the highest rating obtainable from either
S&#038;P or Moody&#146;s; (vi)&nbsp;auction rate securities that have the highest rating
obtainable from either S&#038;P or Moody&#146;s and with a maximum reset date at least
every 30&nbsp;days and (vii)&nbsp;investments made pursuant to the investment portfolio
guidelines from time to time adopted by the board of directors of the Buyer&#146;s
parent or any committee thereof.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#147;<U>Eligible Lender</U>&#148; means (i)&nbsp;so long as any loans or obligations under the
Citi Loan Agreement remain outstanding, any &#147;Eligible Lender&#148; as defined in the
Citi Loan Agreement and (ii)&nbsp;thereafter, (a)&nbsp;a commercial bank having total
assets whose Dollar equivalent exceeds $5,000,000,000 (US dollars &#151; five
billion), (b)&nbsp;a finance company, insurance company or any other financial
institution or fund, in each case reasonably acceptable to the Seller and
regularly engaged in making, purchase or investing in loans and having a net
worth determined in accordance with GAAP, whose Dollar equivalent exceeds
$250,000,000 (US dollars &#151; two hundred fifty million) (or, to the extent net
worth is less than such amount, a finance company, insurance company, other
financial institution or fund, reasonably acceptable to the Seller and the Buyer)
or (c)&nbsp;a savings and loan association or saving bank organized under the laws of
the United States or any State thereof having a net worth, determined in
accordance with GAAP, whose Dollar equivalent exceeds $250,000,000 (US dollars &#151;
two hundred fifty million); <I>provided, however</I>, that the following entities shall
not be deemed to be an &#147;Eligible Lender&#148;: (a)&nbsp;an airline, a commercial aircraft
operator, an air freight forwarder or an entity principally engaged in the
business of parcel transport by air or (b)&nbsp;an affiliate of any entity described
in clause (a)&nbsp;above.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="6%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#147;<U>GAAP</U>&#148; means generally accepted accounting principles in the United
States, as in effect from time to time as set forth in opinions and
pronouncements of the Accounting Principles Board of the American Institute of
Certified Public Accountants and statements and pronouncements of Financial
Accounting Savings Board approved by a significant segment of the accounting
profession in the United States.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#147;Citi Loan Agreement&#148; means the Loan Agreement, dated as of March&nbsp;23, 2007, among
Buyer&#146;s parent, certain subsidiaries of the Buyer&#146;s parent, the lenders from time
to time party thereto and Citicorp North America, Inc., as administrative agent.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>UNQUOTE</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>9.</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U><B>EFFECT OF AMENDMENT</B></U></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">9.1</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The provisions of this Amendment constitute a valid amendment to the Agreement and the
Agreement will be deemed to be amended to the extent herein provided and, except as
specifically amended hereby, will continue in full force and effect in accordance with its
original terms. This Amendment supersedes any previous understandings, commitments, or
representations whatsoever, whether oral or written, related to the subject matter of this
Amendment.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">9.2</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Both parties agree that this Amendment will constitute an integral, nonseverable part of the
Agreement, that the provisions of said Agreement are hereby incorporated herein by reference,
and that this Amendment will be governed by the provisions of the Agreement, except that if
the Agreement and this Amendment have specific provisions that are inconsistent, the specific
provisions contained in this Amendment will govern.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>10.</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U><B>CONFIDENTIALITY</B></U></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>This Amendment is subject to the confidentiality provisions set forth in Clause 22.7 of the
Agreement.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>11.</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U><B>COUNTERPARTS</B></U></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>This Amendment may be signed in separate counterparts. Each counterpart, when signed and
delivered (including counterparts delivered by facsimile transmission), will be an original,
and the counterparts will together constitute one and the same instrument.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left">

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">AMENDED AND RESTATED<BR>
LETTER AGREEMENT NO. 3<BR>
TO AMENDED AND RESTATED A320 FAMILY AIRCRAFT<BR>
PURCHASE AGREEMENT<BR>
Dated as of October&nbsp;2, 2007
</DIV>


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">As of October&nbsp;20, 2008
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">US Airways, Inc.<BR>
111 West Rio Salado Parkway<BR>
Tempe, Arizona 85281

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Re: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Ladies and Gentlemen:
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">US Airways, Inc. (the &#147;<U>Buyer</U>&#148;) and Airbus S.A.S. (the &#147;<U>Seller</U>&#148;) have entered into
an Amended and Restated A320 Family Aircraft Purchase Agreement dated as of October&nbsp;2, 2007, as
amended by Amendment No.&nbsp;1 dated as of January&nbsp;11, 2008 and Amendment No.&nbsp;2 dated as of even date
herewith (the &#147;<U>Agreement</U>&#148;), which covers, among other things, the sale by the Seller and
the purchase by the Buyer of certain Aircraft, under the terms and conditions set forth in said
Agreement. The Buyer and the Seller have agreed to set forth in this Amended and Restated Letter
Agreement No.&nbsp;3 (the &#147;<U>Letter Agreement</U>&#148;) certain additional terms and conditions regarding
the sale of the Aircraft.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Capitalized terms used herein and not otherwise defined in this Letter Agreement will have the
meanings assigned thereto in the Agreement. The terms &#147;herein&#148;, &#147;hereof&#148; and &#147;hereunder&#148; and words
of similar import refer to this Letter Agreement.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">The parties agree that this Letter Agreement will constitute an integral, nonseverable part of said
Agreement, that the provisions of said Agreement are hereby incorporated by reference, and that
this Letter Agreement will be governed by the provisions of said Agreement, except that if the
Agreement and this Letter Agreement have specific provisions that are inconsistent, the specific
provisions contained in this Letter Agreement will govern.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left">
<DIV style="font-size: 3pt; margin-top: 16pt; width: 18%; border-top: 1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</DIV>
</DIV>

    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Notwithstanding any other provision of this Letter Agreement or of the Agreement, this
Letter Agreement and the rights and obligations of the Buyer hereunder will not be assigned
or transferred in any manner without the prior written consent of the Seller, and any
attempted assignment or transfer in contravention of the provisions of this Paragraph&nbsp;13
will be void and of no force or effect.</TD>

<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">AMENDED AND RESTATED<BR>
LETTER AGREEMENT NO. 5<BR>
TO AMENDED AND RESTATED A320 FAMILY PURCHASE AGREEMENT<BR>
Dated as of October&nbsp;2, 2007
</DIV>


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">As of October&nbsp;20, 2008
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">US Airways, Inc.<BR>
111 West Rio Salado Parkway<BR>
Tempe, Arizona 85281

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Re: &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Ladies and Gentlemen,
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">US Airways, Inc. (the &#147;<U>Buyer</U>&#148;) and Airbus S.A.S. (the &#147;<U>Seller</U>&#148;) have entered into
an Amended and Restated A320 Family Aircraft Purchase Agreement, as amended by Amendment No.&nbsp;1
dated as of January&nbsp;11, 2008 and Amendment No.&nbsp;2 dated as of even date herewith (the
&#147;<U>Agreement</U>&#148;), which covers, among other things, the sale by the Seller and the purchase by
the Buyer of certain Aircraft, under the terms and conditions set forth in said Agreement. The
Buyer and the Seller have agreed to set forth in this Amended and Restated Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;5
(the &#147;<U>Letter Agreement</U>&#148;) certain additional terms and conditions regarding the sale of the
Aircraft.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Capitalized terms used herein and not otherwise defined in this Letter Agreement will have the
meanings assigned thereto in the Agreement. The terms &#147;herein&#148;, &#147;hereof&#148; and &#147;hereunder&#148; and words
of similar import refer to this Letter Agreement.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">The parties agree that this Letter Agreement will constitute an integral, nonseverable part of said
Agreement, that the provisions of said Agreement are hereby incorporated by reference, and that
this Letter Agreement will be governed by the provisions of said Agreement, except that if the
Agreement and this Letter Agreement have specific provisions that are inconsistent, the specific
provisions contained in this Letter Agreement will govern.
</DIV>

will be void and of no force or effect.</TD>

<P align="right" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->LA 5<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">
<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">AMENDED AND RESTATED<BR>
LETTER AGREEMENT NO. 9<BR>
TO AMENDED AND RESTATED A320 FAMILY AIRCRAFT PURCHASE AGREEMENT<BR>
Dated as of October&nbsp;2, 2007
</DIV>


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">As of October&nbsp;20, 2008
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">US Airways, Inc.<BR>
111 West Rio Salado Parkway<BR>
Tempe, Arizona 85281

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Re: <U>MISCELLANEOUS TERMS</U>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Ladies and Gentlemen,
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">US Airways, Inc. (the &#147;<U>Buyer</U>&#148;) and Airbus S.A.S. (the &#147;<U>Seller</U>&#148;) have entered into
an Amended and Restated A320 Family Purchase Agreement dated as of October&nbsp;2, 2007, as amended by
Amendment No.&nbsp;1 dated as of January&nbsp;11, 2008 and Amendment No.&nbsp;2 dated as of even date herewith
(the &#147;<U>Agreement</U>&#148;), which covers, among other things, the sale by the Seller and the
purchase by the Buyer of certain Aircraft, under the terms and conditions set forth in said
Agreement. The Buyer and the Seller have agreed to set forth in this Amended and Restated Letter
Agreement No.&nbsp;9 (the &#147;<U>Letter Agreement</U>&#148;) certain additional terms and conditions regarding
the sale of the Aircraft.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Capitalized terms used herein and not otherwise defined in this Letter Agreement will have the
meanings assigned thereto in the Agreement. The terms &#147;herein&#148;, &#147;hereof&#148; and &#147;hereunder&#148; and words
of similar import refer to this Letter Agreement.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">The parties agree that this Letter Agreement will constitute an integral, nonseverable part of said
Agreement, that the provisions of said Agreement are hereby incorporated by reference, and that
this Letter Agreement will be governed by the provisions of said Agreement, except that if the
Agreement and this Letter Agreement have specific provisions that are inconsistent, the specific
provisions contained in this Letter Agreement will govern.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left">
<DIV style="font-size: 3pt; margin-top: 16pt; width: 18%; border-top: 1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</DIV>
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">3.</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>ASSIGNMENT</U></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Except as set forth in Clause 20.2 of the Agreement, this Letter Agreement and the rights
and obligations of the Buyer hereunder will not be assigned or transferred in any manner
without the prior written consent of the Seller, and any attempted assignment or transfer
in contravention of the provisions of this Paragraph&nbsp;3 will be void and of no force or
effect.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">4.</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>COUNTERPARTS</U></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>This Letter Agreement may be signed in any number of separate counterparts. Each
counterpart, when signed and delivered (including counterparts delivered by facsimile
transmission), will be an original, and the counterparts will together constitute one same
instrument.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>Exhibit&nbsp;10.8</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">Amendment No.&nbsp;2
</DIV>


<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">to the

</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">A330 Purchase Agreement

</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">dated as of October&nbsp;2, 2007

</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">between

</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">AIRBUS S.A.S.

</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">and

</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">US AIRWAYS, INC.

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">This Amendment No.&nbsp;2 to the A330 Purchase Agreement between Airbus S.A.S. and US Airways, Inc.,
(this &#147;<U>Amendment</U>&#148;) is entered into as of October&nbsp;20, 2008, by and between Airbus S.A.S., a
<I>soci&#233;t&#233; par actions simplifi&#233;e, </I>organized and existing under the laws of the Republic of France,
having its registered office located at 1, rond-point Maurice Bellonte, 31700 Blagnac, France (the
&#147;<U>Seller</U>&#148;), and US Airways, Inc., a corporation organized and existing under the laws of the
State of Delaware, United States of America, having its principal corporate offices located at 111
West Rio Salado Parkway, Tempe, Arizona 85281, U.S.A. (the &#147;<U>Buyer</U>&#148;);
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">WITNESSETH:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">WHEREAS, the Buyer and the Seller entered into an Airbus A330 Purchase Agreement, dated as of
October&nbsp;2, 2007, which agreement, as previously amended by and supplemented with all Exhibits,
Appendices, Letter Agreements and amendments, including Amendment No.&nbsp;1 executed November&nbsp;15, 2007,
(the &#147;<U>Agreement</U>&#148;) relates to the sale by the Seller and the purchase by the Buyer of
certain Airbus A330 model aircraft.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">WHEREAS, the Seller has proposed to the Buyer that in exchange for the agreement of the Buyer to
amend, among other things, certain provisions of the Aggregate Agreements (as hereinafter defined)
**;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">WHEREAS, the amendments referred to above are set forth in this Amendment by and between the Seller
and the Buyer, dated as of even date herewith (&#147;<U>Amendment No.&nbsp;2</U>&#148;), the Amended and Restated
Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;5 to the Agreement, dated as of even date herewith (&#147;<U>Amended and Restated
Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;5</U>&#148;), and the Amended and Restated Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;9 to the Agreement,
dated as of even date herewith (&#147;<U>Amended and Restated Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;9</U>&#148;);
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">WHEREAS, the Buyer is willing to enter into (A)&nbsp;this Amendment including Amended and Restated
Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;5 and Amended and Restated Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;9, (B)&nbsp;Amendment No.&nbsp;1 to the
Amended and Restated Airbus A350 XWB Purchase Agreement dated as of even date herewith, (C)
Amendment No.&nbsp;2 to the Amended and Restated Airbus A320 Family Aircraft Purchase Agreement dated as
of even date herewith, (D) ** and (E) ** (collectively the &#147;<U>Aggregate Agreements</U>&#148;) **;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left">
<DIV style="font-size: 3pt; margin-top: 16pt; width: 18%; border-top: 1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</DIV>
</DIV>

similar import refer to this Amendment.

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">The following is inserted into the Agreement after Clause 22.13:
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>

    <TD>QUOTE</TD>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">22.14</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>Asset Covenants</U></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">22.14.1</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The Buyer shall not sell, transfer, convey, assign or otherwise dispose of any of
its properties or other assets or operated Airbus aircraft to the extent any such
disposition (i)&nbsp;materially impairs the business or operations of the Buyer, (ii)
materially changes the nature of the Buyer&#146;s business, (iii)&nbsp;constitutes a disposition
of a substantial portion of the Buyer&#146;s assets or (iv)&nbsp;constitutes a disposition of a
substantial portion of the Buyer&#146;s Airbus aircraft fleet in-service as of the date
hereof.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">22.14.2</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#147;Minimum Unrestricted Cash. The Buyer will not permit the aggregate amount of
Unrestricted Cash (as hereinafter defined) to be less than required in the Citi Loan
Agreement from time to time or any successor agreement or facility thereof, **.&#148;</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#147;<U>Unrestricted Cash</U>&#148; means cash and Cash Equivalents (as hereinafter
defined) of the Buyer, its parent and affiliates that (i)&nbsp;may be classified, in
accordance with GAAP, as &#147;unrestricted&#148; on the consolidated balance sheets of the
Buyer&#146;s parent or (ii)&nbsp;may be qualified, in accordance with GAAP, as &#147;restricted&#148;
on the consolidated balance sheets of the Buyer&#146;s parent solely in favor of the
administrative agent and any lenders pursuant to the Citi Loan Agreement and the
related loan documents (or any amendment, replacement or refinancing thereof).</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#147;<U>Cash Equivalents</U>&#148; means, as at any date of determination, (i)&nbsp;marketable
securities (a)&nbsp;issued or directly and unconditionally guaranteed as to interest
and principal by the United States government or (b)&nbsp;issued by any agency or
instrumentality of the United States the obligations of which are backed by the
full faith and credit of the United States, in each case maturing within one year
after such date; (ii)&nbsp;marketable direct obligations issued by any state of the
United States of America or any political subdivision of any such state or any
instrumentality thereof, in each case maturing within one year after such date
and having, at the time of the acquisition thereof, the highest rating obtainable
from either S&#038;P or Moody&#146;s; (iii)&nbsp;commercial paper not issued by the Buyer&#146;s
parent maturing no more than one year after such date and having, at the time of
the acquisition thereof, a rating of at least A-2 from S&#038;P or at least P-2 from
Moody&#146;s; (iv)&nbsp;certificates of deposit or bankers&#146; acceptances maturing within one
year after such date and issued or accepted by any Eligible Lender (as
hereinafter defined) or by any commercial bank organized under the laws of the
United States of America or any state thereof or the District of Columbia that
(a)&nbsp;is at least &#147;adequately capitalized&#148; (as defined in the regulations of its
primary Federal banking regulator) and (b)&nbsp;has Tier 1 capital (as defined in such
regulations) of not less than $500,000,000 (US dollars &#150; five hundred million);
(v)&nbsp;shares of any money market mutual fund that (a)&nbsp;has at least 95% of its
assets invested continuously in the types of investments referred to in clauses
(i)&nbsp;and (ii)&nbsp;above, (b)&nbsp;has net assets of not less than $500,000,000 (US dollars
&#150; five hundred million), and (c)&nbsp;has the highest rating obtainable from either
S&#038;P or Moody&#146;s; (vi)&nbsp;auction rate securities that have the highest rating
obtainable from either S&#038;P or Moody&#146;s and with a maximum reset date at least
every 30&nbsp;days and (vii)&nbsp;investments made pursuant to the investment portfolio
guidelines from time to time adopted by the board of directors of the Buyer&#146;s
parent or any committee thereof.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="4%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#147;<U>Eligible Lender</U>&#148; means (i)&nbsp;so long as any loans or obligations under the
Citi Loan Agreement remain outstanding, any &#147;Eligible Lender&#148; as defined in the
Citi Loan</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="7%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Agreement and (ii)&nbsp;thereafter, (a)&nbsp;a commercial bank having total assets whose
Dollar equivalent exceeds $5,000,000,000 (US dollars &#150; five billion), (b)&nbsp;a
finance company, insurance company or any other financial institution or fund, in
each case reasonably acceptable to the Seller and regularly engaged in making,
purchase or investing in loans and having a net worth determined in accordance
with GAAP, whose Dollar equivalent exceeds $250,000,000 (US dollars &#150; two hundred
fifty million) (or, to the extent net worth is less than such amount, a finance
company, insurance company, other financial institution or fund, reasonably
acceptable to the Seller and the Buyer) or (c)&nbsp;a savings and loan association or
saving bank organized under the laws of the United States or any State thereof
having a net worth, determined in accordance with GAAP, whose Dollar equivalent
exceeds $250,000,000 (US dollars &#150; two hundred fifty million); <I>provided, however</I>,
that the following entities shall not be deemed to be an &#147;Eligible Lender&#148;: (a)
an airline, a commercial aircraft operator, an air freight forwarder or an entity
principally engaged in the business of parcel transport by air or (b)&nbsp;an
affiliate of any entity described in clause (a)&nbsp;above.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#147;<U>GAAP</U>&#148; means generally accepted accounting principles in the United
States, as in effect from time to time as set forth in opinions and
pronouncements of the Accounting Principles Board of the American Institute of
Certified Public Accountants and statements and pronouncements of Financial
Accounting Savings Board approved by a significant segment of the accounting
profession in the United States.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#147;<U>Citi Loan Agreement</U>&#148; means the Loan Agreement, dated as of March&nbsp;23,
2007, among Buyer&#146;s parent, certain subsidiaries of the Buyer&#146;s parent, the
lenders from time to time party thereto and Citicorp North America, Inc., as
administrative agent.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>7.</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U><B>EFFECT OF AMENDMENT</B></U></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">7.1</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Upon execution, Amendment will constitute a valid amendment to the Agreement and the
Agreement will be deemed to be amended to the extent herein provided and, except as
specifically amended hereby, will continue in full force and effect in accordance with its
original terms. This Amendment supersedes any previous understandings, commitments or
representations whatsoever, whether oral or written, related to the subject matter of this
Amendment.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">7.2</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Both parties agree that this Amendment will constitute an integral, nonseverable part of the
Agreement, that the provisions of the Agreement are hereby incorporated herein by reference,
and that this Amendment will be governed by the provisions of the Agreement, except that if
the Agreement and this Amendment have specific provisions that are inconsistent, the specific
provisions contained in this Amendment will govern.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>8.</B></TD>

    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>This Amendment is subject to the confidentiality provisions set forth in Clause 22.7 of the
Agreement.</TD>
</TR>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">AMENDED AND RESTATED<BR>
LETTER AGREEMENT NO. 5<BR>
TO AIRBUS A330 PURCHASE AGREEMENT<BR>
Dated as of October&nbsp;2, 2007
</DIV>


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">October&nbsp;20, 2008
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">US Airways, Inc.<BR>
111 West Rio Salado Pkwy<BR>
Tempe, Arizona 85281

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Re: **
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Ladies and Gentlemen,

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">US Airways, Inc. (the &#147;<U>Buyer</U>&#148;) and Airbus S.A.S. (the &#147;<U>Seller</U>&#148;) have entered into
an Airbus A330 Purchase Agreement dated as of October&nbsp;2, 2007, as amended by Amendment No.&nbsp;1 dated
as of November&nbsp;15, 2007 and Amendment No.&nbsp;2 thereto dated as of even date herewith, (the
&#147;<U>Agreement</U>&#148;) which covers, among other things, the sale by the Seller and the purchase by
the Buyer of certain Aircraft, under the terms and conditions set forth in said Agreement. The
Buyer and the Seller have agreed to set forth in this Amended and Restated Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;5
(the &#147;<U>Letter Agreement</U>&#148;) certain additional terms and conditions regarding the sale of the
Aircraft.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Capitalized terms used herein and not otherwise defined in this Letter Agreement will have the
meanings assigned thereto in the Agreement. The terms &#147;herein,&#148; &#147;hereof&#148; and &#147;hereunder&#148; and words
of similar import refer to this Letter Agreement.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">The parties agree that this Letter Agreement will constitute an integral, nonseverable part of said
Agreement, that the provisions of said Agreement are hereby incorporated herein by reference, and
that this Letter Agreement will be governed by the provisions of said Agreement, except that if the
Agreement and this Letter Agreement have specific provisions that are inconsistent, the specific
provisions contained in this Letter Agreement will govern.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left">
<DIV style="font-size: 3pt; margin-top: 16pt; width: 18%; border-top: 1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</DIV>
</DIV>

<DIV align="center">
<TABLE style="font-size: 10pt" cellspacing="0" border="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%">
<!-- Begin Table Head -->
<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD width="47%"></TD>
    <TD width="5%"></TD>
    <TD width="47%"></TD>
</TR>
<!-- End Table Head -->
<!-- Begin Table Body -->
