<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>**</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">3.</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>ASSIGNMENT</U></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Except as set forth in Clause 20.2 of the Agreement, this Letter Agreement and the rights
and obligations of the Buyer hereunder will not be assigned or transferred in any manner
without the prior written consent of the Seller, and any attempted assignment or transfer in
contravention of the provisions of this Letter Agreement will be void and of no force or
effect.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">4.</TD>

    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>This Letter Agreement may be signed in any number of separate counterparts. Each
counterpart, when signed and delivered (including counterparts delivered by facsimile
transmission), will be an original, and the counterparts will together constitute one same
instrument.</TD>
</TR>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">AMENDED AND RESTATED<BR>
LETTER AGREEMENT NO. 9<BR>
TO AIRBUS A330 PURCHASE AGREEMENT<BR>
Dated as of October&nbsp;2, 2007
</DIV>


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">As of October&nbsp;20, 2008
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">US Airways, Inc.<BR>
111 West Rio Salado Parkway<BR>
Tempe, Arizona 85281

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Re: <U>MISCELLANEOUS</U>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Ladies and Gentlemen,

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">US Airways, Inc., (the &#147;<U>Buyer</U>&#148;) and Airbus S.A.S. (the &#147;<U>Seller</U>&#148;) have entered into
an Airbus A330 Purchase Agreement dated as of October&nbsp;2, 2007, as amended by Amendment No.&nbsp;1 dated
as of even date herewith (the &#147;<U>Agreement</U>&#148;), which covers, among other things, the sale by
the Seller and the purchase by the Buyer of certain Aircraft, under the terms and conditions set
forth in said Agreement. The Buyer and the Seller have agreed to set forth in this Amended and
Restated Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;9 (the &#147;<U>Letter Agreement</U>&#148;) certain additional terms and
conditions regarding the sale of the Aircraft.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Capitalized terms used herein and not otherwise defined in this Letter Agreement will have the
meanings assigned thereto in the Agreement. The terms &#147;herein,&#148; &#147;hereof&#148; and &#147;hereunder&#148; and words
of similar import refer to this Letter Agreement.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">The parties agree that this Letter Agreement will constitute an integral, nonseverable part of said
Agreement, that the provisions of said Agreement are hereby incorporated herein by reference, and
that this Letter Agreement will be governed by the provisions of said Agreement, except that if the
Agreement and this Letter Agreement have specific provisions that are inconsistent, the specific
provisions contained in this Letter Agreement will govern.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left">
<DIV style="font-size: 3pt; margin-top: 16pt; width: 18%; border-top: 1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</DIV>
</DIV>

<DIV align="center">
<TABLE style="font-size: 10pt" cellspacing="0" border="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%">

<DESCRIPTION>EX-10.23

<HTML>
<HEAD>
<TITLE>exv10w23</TITLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY bgcolor="#FFFFFF">
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>Exhibit&nbsp;10.23</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">Amendment No.&nbsp;1
</DIV>


<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">to the

</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Amended and Restated Airbus A350 XWB Purchase Agreement

</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">dated as of October&nbsp;2, 2007

</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">between

</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">AIRBUS S.A.S.

</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">and

</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">US AIRWAYS, INC.

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">This Amendment No.&nbsp;1 to the Amended and Restated Airbus A350 XWB Purchase Agreement between Airbus
S.A.S. and US Airways, Inc., (this &#147;<U>Amendment</U>&#148;) is entered into as of October&nbsp;20, 2008 by
and between Airbus S.A.S., a <I>soci&#233;t&#233; par actions simplifi&#233;e, </I>organized and existing under the laws
of the Republic of France, having its registered office located at 1, rond-point Maurice Bellonte,
31700 Blagnac, France (the &#147;<U>Seller</U>&#148;), and US Airways, Inc., a corporation organized and
existing under the laws of the State of Delaware, United States of America, having its principal
corporate offices located at 111 West Rio Salado Parkway, Tempe, Arizona 85281, U.S.A. (the
&#147;<U>Buyer</U>&#148;);
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">WITNESSETH:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">WHEREAS, the Buyer and the Seller entered into an Amended and Restated Airbus A350 XWB Purchase
Agreement, dated as of October&nbsp;2, 2007, relating to the sale by the Seller and the purchase by the
Buyer of certain Airbus A350&nbsp;XWB model aircraft, which, together with all Exhibits, Appendices and
Letter Agreements attached thereto, is hereinafter called the &#147;Agreement.&#148;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">WHEREAS, the Seller has proposed to the Buyer that in exchange for the agreement of the Buyer to
amend, among other things, certain provisions of the Aggregate Agreements (as hereinafter defined)
**;</DIV>
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">WHEREAS, the amendments referred to above are set forth in this Amendment by and between the Seller
and the Buyer, dated as of even date herewith (&#147;<U>Amendment No.&nbsp;1</U>&#148;), the Amended and Restated
Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;3 to the Agreement, dated as of even date herewith (&#147;<U>Amended and Restated
Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;3</U>&#148;), the Amended and Restated Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;5 to the Agreement,
dated as of even date herewith (&#147;<U>Amended and Restated Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;5</U>&#148;) and the
Amended and Restated Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;9 to the Agreement, dated as of even date herewith
(&#147;<U>Amended and Restated Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;9</U>&#148;);
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">WHEREAS, the Buyer is willing to enter into (A)&nbsp;this Amendment, Amended and Restated Letter
Agreement No.&nbsp;3, Amended and Restated Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;5 and Amended and Restated Letter
Agreement No.&nbsp;9, (B)&nbsp;Amendment No.&nbsp;2 to the Airbus A330 Purchase Agreement dated as of even date
herewith, (C)&nbsp;Amendment No.&nbsp;2 to the Amended and Restated Airbus A320 Family Aircraft Purchase
Agreement dated as of even date herewith, (D)** and (E)** (collectively the &#147;<U>Aggregate
Agreements</U>&#148;)**;
</DIV>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">WHEREAS, the Buyer and the Seller agree and acknowledge that such amendments ** are an adjustment
to the commercial terms set forth in the Agreement and are not intended to be**;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">WHEREAS the Buyer and the Seller agree and acknowledge that such amendments to the commercial terms
set forth in the Agreement are intended**; and
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">WHEREAS, the Buyer and the Seller acknowledge that immediately upon execution of this Amendment,
concurrently with the execution of the above referenced amendments, the Seller will**;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">NOW, THEREFORE, IT IS AGREED AS FOLLOWS:
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Capitalized terms used herein and not otherwise defined in this Amendment will have the meanings
assigned to them in the Agreement. The terms &#147;herein,&#148; &#147;hereof,&#148; and &#147;hereunder&#148; and words of
similar import refer to this Amendment.

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>11. </B><U><B>ASSET COVENANTS</B></U>

</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 2%">QUOTE
</DIV>
<DIV align="center">
<TABLE style="font-size: 10pt" cellspacing="0" border="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%">
<!-- Begin Table Head -->

    <TD width="3%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>

    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>

<!-- Begin Table Body -->

    <TD align="left" valign="bottom"><U>Asset Covenants</U></TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD nowrap align="right" valign="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="right" valign="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD valign="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD nowrap align="right" valign="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="right" valign="bottom">22.14.1</TD>
    <TD nowrap valign="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="bottom">The Buyer shall not sell, transfer, convey, assign or otherwise dispose of any of
its properties or other assets or operated Airbus aircraft to the extent any such
disposition (k)&nbsp;materially impairs the business or operations of the Buyer, (ii)
materially changes the nature of the Buyer&#146;s business, (iii)&nbsp;constitutes a disposition
of a substantial portion of the Buyer&#146;s assets or (iv)&nbsp;constitutes a disposition of a
substantial portion of the Buyer&#146;s Airbus aircraft fleet in-service as of the date
hereof.</TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD nowrap align="right" valign="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="right" valign="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD valign="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD nowrap align="right" valign="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="right" valign="bottom">22.14.2</TD>
    <TD nowrap valign="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="bottom">Minimum Unrestricted Cash. The Buyer will not permit the aggregate amount of
Unrestricted Cash (as hereinafter defined) to be less than required in the Citi Loan
Agreement from time to time or any successor agreement or facility thereof,**.</TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD nowrap align="right" valign="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="right" valign="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD valign="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="bottom" colspan="0">&#147;<U>Unrestricted Cash</U>&#148; means cash and Cash Equivalents (as hereinafter
defined) of the Buyer, its parent and affiliates that (i)&nbsp;may be classified, in
accordance with GAAP, as &#147;unrestricted&#148; on the consolidated balance sheets of the
Buyer&#146;s parent or (ii)&nbsp;may be qualified, in accordance with GAAP, as &#147;restricted&#148;
on the consolidated balance sheets of the Buyer&#146;s parent solely in favor of the
administrative agent and any lenders pursuant to the Citi Loan Agreement and the
related loan documents (or any amendment, replacement or refinancing thereof).</TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD nowrap align="right" valign="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="right" valign="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD valign="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>
<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="bottom" colspan="0">&#147;<U>Cash Equivalents</U>&#148; means, as at any date of determination, (i)&nbsp;marketable
securities (a)&nbsp;issued or directly and unconditionally guaranteed as to interest
and principal by the United States government or (b)&nbsp;issued by any agency or
instrumentality of the United</TD>

</TR>
<!-- End Table Body -->
</TABLE>

    <TD align="left" valign="top">States the obligations of which are backed by the full faith and credit of the
United States, in each case maturing within one year after such date; (ii)
marketable direct obligations issued by any state of the United States of America
or any political subdivision of any such state or any instrumentality thereof, in
each case maturing within one year after such date and having, at the time of the

(iii)&nbsp;commercial paper not issued by the Buyer&#146;s parent maturing no more than one

state thereof or the District of Columbia that (a)&nbsp;is at least &#147;adequately
capitalized&#148; (as defined in the regulations of its primary Federal banking
regulator) and (b)&nbsp;has Tier 1 capital (as defined in such regulations) of not
less than $500,000,000 (US dollars &#150; five hundred million); (v)&nbsp;shares of any
money market mutual fund that (a)&nbsp;has at least 95% of its assets invested
continuously in the types of investments referred to in clauses (i)&nbsp;and (ii)
above, (b)&nbsp;has net assets of not less than $500,000,000 (US dollars &#150; five
hundred million), and (c)&nbsp;has the highest rating obtainable from either S&#038;P or
Moody&#146;s; (vi)&nbsp;auction rate securities that have the highest rating obtainable
from either S&#038;P or Moody&#146;s and with a maximum reset date at least every 30&nbsp;days
and (vii)&nbsp;investments made pursuant to the investment portfolio guidelines from
time to time adopted by the board of directors of the Buyer&#146;s parent or any
committee thereof.</TD>
</TR>

    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="left" valign="top">&#147;<U>Eligible Lender</U>&#148; means (i)&nbsp;so long as any loans or obligations under the
Citi Loan Agreement remain outstanding, any &#147;Eligible Lender&#148; as defined in the
Citi Loan Agreement and (ii)&nbsp;thereafter, (a)&nbsp;a commercial bank having total
assets whose Dollar equivalent exceeds $5,000,000,000 (US dollars &#150; five
billion), (b)&nbsp;a finance company, insurance company or any other financial
institution or fund, in each case reasonably acceptable to the Seller and
regularly engaged in making, purchase or investing in loans and having a net
worth determined in accordance with GAAP, whose Dollar equivalent exceeds
$250,000,000 (US dollars &#150; two hundred fifty million) (or, to the extent net
worth is less than such amount, a finance company, insurance company, other
financial institution or fund, reasonably acceptable to the Seller and the Buyer)
or (c)&nbsp;a savings and loan association or saving bank organized under the laws of
the United States or any State thereof having a net worth, determined in
accordance with GAAP, whose Dollar equivalent exceeds $250,000,000 (US dollars &#150;
two hundred fifty million); <I>provided, however</I>, that the following entities shall
not be deemed to be an &#147;Eligible Lender&#148;: (a)&nbsp;an airline, a commercial aircraft
operator, an air freight forwarder or an entity principally engaged in the
business of parcel transport by air or (b)&nbsp;an affiliate of any entity described
in clause (a)&nbsp;above.</TD>
</TR>
<!-- End Table Body -->
</TABLE>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 15%">&#147;<U>GAAP</U>&#148; means generally accepted accounting principles in the United
States, as in effect from time to time as set forth in opinions and
pronouncements of the Accounting Principles Board of the American Institute of
Certified Public Accountants and statements and pronouncements of Financial
Accounting Savings Board approved by a significant segment of the accounting
profession in the United States.

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%">UNQUOTE
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>12.</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U><B>EFFECT OF AMENDMENT</B></U></TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">12.1</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Upon execution, Amendment will constitute a valid amendment to the Agreement and the
Agreement will be deemed to be amended to the extent herein provided and, except as
specifically amended hereby, will continue in full force and effect in accordance with its
original terms. This Amendment supersedes any previous understandings, commitments or
representations whatsoever, whether oral or written, related to the subject matter of this
Amendment.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">12.2</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Both parties agree that this Amendment will constitute an integral, nonseverable part of the
Agreement, that the provisions of the Agreement are hereby incorporated herein by reference,
and that this Amendment will be governed by the provisions of the Agreement, except that if
the Agreement and this Amendment have specific provisions that are inconsistent, the specific
provisions contained in this Amendment will govern.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>13.</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U><B>CONFIDENTIALITY</B></U></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>This Amendment is subject to the confidentiality provisions set forth in Clause 22.7 of the
Agreement.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><U>EXHIBIT A</U>
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt"><U>APPENDIX B TO LETTER AGREEMENT NO. 12</U>
</DIV>


<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Planning for the delivery of the A350-800/Trent XWB 75,000 lb aircraft:

</DIV>
<DIV align="center">
<TABLE style="font-size: 10pt" cellspacing="0" border="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%">
<!-- Begin Table Head -->

    <TD width="35%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="7%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="7%">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>
<TR style="font-size: 8pt" valign="bottom">
    <TD nowrap align="center" style="border-bottom: 1px solid #000000">Scheduled Delivery Quarter </TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD nowrap align="center" style="border-bottom: 1px solid #000000">Year</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD nowrap align="center" style="border-bottom: 1px solid #000000">Quantity</TD>
</TR>

<!-- End Table Head -->
<!-- Begin Table Body -->
<TR valign="bottom" style="background: #cceeff">

<P align="right" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->LA 12 - 15 of 15<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>



<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">AMENDED AND RESTATED<BR>
LETTER AGREEMENT NO. 3<BR>
TO THE AMENDED AND RESTATED AIRBUS A350 XWB PURCHASE AGREEMENT<BR>
Dated as of October&nbsp;2, 2007
</DIV>


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">As of October&nbsp;20, 2008
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">US Airways, Inc.<BR>
111 West Rio Salado Parkway<BR>
Tempe, Arizona 85281

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Re: **
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Ladies and Gentlemen,
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">US Airways, Inc. (the &#147;<U>Buyer</U>&#148;) and Airbus S.A.S. (the &#147;<U>Seller</U>&#148;) have entered into
an Amended and Restated A350 XWB Purchase Agreement dated as of October&nbsp;2, 2007, as amended by
Amendment No.&nbsp;1 dated as of even date herewith (the &#147;<U>Agreement</U>&#148;) which covers, among other
things, the sale by the Seller and the purchase by the Buyer of certain Aircraft, under the terms
and conditions set forth in said Agreement. The Buyer and the Seller have agreed to set forth in
this Amended and Restated Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;3 (the &#147;<U>Letter Agreement</U>&#148;) certain
additional terms and conditions regarding the sale of the Aircraft.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">Capitalized terms used herein and not otherwise defined in this Letter Agreement will have the
meanings assigned thereto in the Agreement. The terms &#147;herein&#148;, &#147;hereof&#148; and &#147;hereunder&#148; and words
of similar import refer to this Letter Agreement.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">The parties agree that this Letter Agreement will constitute an integral, nonseverable part of said
Agreement, that the provisions of said Agreement are hereby incorporated by reference, and that
this Letter Agreement will be governed by the provisions of said Agreement, except that if the
Agreement and this Letter Agreement have specific provisions that are inconsistent, the specific
provisions contained in this Letter Agreement will govern.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left">
<DIV style="font-size: 3pt; margin-top: 16pt; width: 18%; border-top: 1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</DIV>
</DIV>

    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Except as set forth in Clause 20.2 of the Agreement, this Letter Agreement and the rights
and obligations of the Buyer hereunder will not be assigned or transferred in any manner
without the prior written consent of the Seller, and any attempted assignment or transfer in
contravention of the provisions of this Letter Agreement will be void and of no force or
effect.</TD>
</TR>

the same instrument.</TD>

<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">AMENDED AND RESTATED<BR>
LETTER AGREEMENT NO. 5<BR>
TO AMENDED AND RESTATED AIRBUS A350 XWB PURCHASE AGREEMENT<BR>
Dated as of October&nbsp;2, 2007
</DIV>


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">As of October&nbsp;20, 2008
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">US Airways, Inc.<BR>
111 West Rio Salado Parkway<BR>
Tempe, Arizona 85281

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Re: **
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Ladies and Gentlemen,
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">US Airways, Inc. (the &#147;<U>Buyer</U>&#148;) and Airbus S.A.S. (the &#147;<U>Seller</U>&#148;) have entered into
an Amended and Restated A350 XWB Purchase Agreement dated as of October&nbsp;2, 2007, as amended by
Amendment No.&nbsp;1 dated as of even date herewith, (the &#147;<U>Agreement</U>&#148;) which covers, among other
things, the sale by the Seller and the purchase by the Buyer of certain Aircraft, under the terms
and conditions set forth in said Agreement. The Buyer and the Seller have agreed to set forth in
this Amended and Restated Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;5 (the &#147;<U>Letter Agreement</U>&#148;) certain
additional terms and conditions regarding the sale of the Aircraft.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">Capitalized terms used herein and not otherwise defined in this Letter Agreement will have the
meanings assigned thereto in the Agreement. The terms &#147;herein,&#148; &#147;hereof&#148; and &#147;hereunder&#148; and words
of similar import refer to this Letter Agreement.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">The parties agree that this Letter Agreement will constitute an integral, nonseverable part of said
Agreement, that the provisions of said Agreement are hereby incorporated herein by reference, and
that this Letter Agreement will be governed by the provisions of said Agreement, except that if the
Agreement and this Letter Agreement have specific provisions that are inconsistent, the specific
provisions contained in this Letter Agreement will govern.
</DIV>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">**
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">3.</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>ASSIGNMENT</U></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Except as set forth in Clause 20.2 of the Agreement, this Letter Agreement and the rights
and obligations of the Buyer hereunder will not be assigned or transferred in any manner
without the prior written consent of the Seller, and any attempted assignment or transfer in
contravention of the provisions of this Letter Agreement will be void and of no force or
effect.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>

the same instrument.</TD>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">AMENDED AND RESTATED<BR>
LETTER AGREEMENT NO. 9<BR>
TO AMENDED AND RESTATED AIRBUS A350 XWB AIRCRAFT PURCHASE AGREEMENT<BR>
Dated as of October&nbsp;2, 2007
</DIV>


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">As of October&nbsp;20, 2008
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">US Airways, Inc.<BR>
111 West Rio Salado Parkway<BR>
Tempe, Arizona 85281

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">Re: <U>MISCELLANEOUS</U>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Ladies and Gentlemen,

</DIV>
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">US Airways, Inc. (the &#147;<U>Buyer</U>&#148;) and Airbus S.A.S. (the &#147;<U>Seller</U>&#148;) have entered into
an Amended and Restated A350 XWB Purchase Agreement dated as of October&nbsp;2, 2007, as amended by
Amendment No.&nbsp;1 dated as of even date herewith, (the &#147;<U>Agreement</U>&#148;), which covers, among
other things, the sale by the Seller and the purchase by the Buyer of certain Aircraft, under the
terms and conditions set forth in said Agreement. The Buyer and the Seller have agreed to set
forth in this Amended and Restated Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;9 (the &#147;<U>Letter Agreement</U>&#148;) certain
additional terms and conditions regarding the sale of the Aircraft.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">Capitalized terms used herein and not otherwise defined in this Letter Agreement will have the
meanings assigned thereto in the Agreement. The terms &#147;herein,&#148; &#147;hereof&#148; and &#147;hereunder&#148; and words
of similar import refer to this Letter Agreement.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">The parties agree that this Letter Agreement will constitute an integral, non-severable part of
said Agreement, that the provisions of said Agreement are hereby incorporated herein by reference,
and that this Letter Agreement will be governed by the provisions of said Agreement, except that if
the Agreement and this Letter Agreement have specific provisions which are inconsistent, the
specific provisions contained in this Letter Agreement will govern.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left">
<DIV style="font-size: 3pt; margin-top: 16pt; width: 18%; border-top: 1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV align="center">
<TABLE style="font-size: 10pt" cellspacing="0" border="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%">
<!-- Begin Table Head -->
<TR valign="bottom" style="font-size: 3pt">
    <TD width="47%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="5%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="47%">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>
<!-- End Table Head -->
<!-- Begin Table Body -->

<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD align="left" valign="top">**Confidential Treatment Requested. <BR>
USA &#151; Amended and Restated Letter Agreement No.&nbsp;9 to <BR>
Amended and Restated Airbus A350 XWB Purchase Agreement <BR>
Execution <BR>
081020-CT0803167-LA9-USA-A350
</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="right" valign="top"><BR>

    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>LEASED AIRCRAFT</U></TD>

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%">Except as set forth in Clause 20.2 of the Agreement, this Letter Agreement and the
rights and obligations of the Buyer hereunder will not be assigned or transferred in
any manner without the prior written consent of the Seller, and any attempted
assignment or transfer in contravention of the provisions of this Paragraph&nbsp;4 will
be void and of no force or effect.

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>Exhibit&nbsp;10.30</B></DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt"><B>AMENDMENT No.&nbsp;6 TO AMENDED AND RESTATED<BR>
PURCHASE AGREEMENT DCT-021/03</B></DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">This Amendment No.&nbsp;6 to the Amended and Restated Purchase Agreement DCT-021/03, dated as of October
22, 2008 (&#147;Amendment No.&nbsp;6&#148;) relates to the Amended and Restated Purchase Agreement DCT-021/03 (the
&#147;Purchase Agreement&#148;) between Embraer &#151; Empresa Brasileira de Aeron&#225;utica S.A. (&#147;Embraer&#148;) and US
Airways Group, Inc. (&#147;Buyer&#148;) dated June&nbsp;13, 2006, as amended from time to time (collectively
referred to herein as &#147;Agreement&#148;). This Amendment No.&nbsp;6 is between Embraer and Buyer,
collectively referred to herein as the &#147;Parties&#148;.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">This Amendment No.&nbsp;6 sets forth additional agreements between Embraer and Buyer with respect to the
matters set forth herein.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Except as otherwise provided for herein, all terms of the Purchase Agreement shall remain in full
force and effect. All capitalized terms used in this Amendment No.&nbsp;6 which are not defined herein
shall have the meaning given in the Purchase Agreement. In the event of any conflict between this
Amendment No.&nbsp;6 and the Purchase Agreement, the terms, conditions and provisions of this Amendment
No.&nbsp;6 shall control.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>WHEREAS, </B>Embraer and Buyer have agreed to revise the Contractual Delivery Month of the Additional
Aircraft and Option Aircraft.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>NOW, THEREFORE</B>, for good and valuable consideration which is hereby acknowledged, Embraer and Buyer
hereby agree as follows:
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>1. Additional Aircraft delivery schedule:</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">1.1 Article&nbsp;1.2 of Attachment &#147;E&#148; to the Purchase Agreement shall be deleted and replaced by the
following:
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt">&#147;1.2 Additional Aircraft, subject to confirmation by Buyer
</DIV>

    <TD align="center" valign="top"><DIV style="margin-left:0px; text-indent:-0px">17
</DIV></TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="center" valign="top">**</TD>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>3. Miscellaneous:</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">All other terms and conditions of the Purchase Agreement which are not specifically amended or
modified by this Amendment No.&nbsp;6 shall remain in full force and effect without any change.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, EMBRAER and BUYER, by their duly authorized officers, have entered into and
executed this Amendment No.&nbsp;6 to Purchase Agreement to be effective as of the date first written
above.
</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt"><B>AMENDMENT NO. 6</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>TO</B>

</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>AMERICA WEST CO-BRANDED CARD AGREEMENT</B>

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;THIS AMENDMENT NO. 6 TO AMERICA WEST CO-BRANDED CARD AGREEMENT (&#147;<B>Amendment No.&nbsp;6</B>&#148;) is dated
October&nbsp;17, 2008, by and between US AIRWAYS GROUP, INC., a Delaware corporation (&#147;<B>US Airways
Group</B>&#148;), and BARCLAYS BANK DELAWARE formerly known as JUNIPER BANK (&#147;<B>Juniper Bank</B>&#148;).
</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><U><B>RECITALS</B></U>

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS, America West Airlines, Inc. (&#147;<B>America West</B>&#148;) and Juniper Bank are parties to that
certain America West Co-Branded Card Agreement, dated January&nbsp;25, 2005 (the &#147;<B>Original Agreement</B>&#148;);
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS, US Airways Group merged with America West&#146;s parent company, America West Holdings
Corporation, and America West assigned its rights and obligations under the Original Agreement to
US Airways Group pursuant to that certain Assignment and First Amendment to America West Co-Branded
Card Agreement, dated August&nbsp;8, 2005 (the &#147;<B>First Amendment</B>&#148;), as amended by that certain Amendment
No.&nbsp;2 to America West Co-Branded Card Agreement, dated September&nbsp;26, 2005 (the &#147;<B>Second Amendment</B>&#148;),
as amended by that certain Amendment No.&nbsp;3 to America West Co-Branded Card Agreement, dated
December&nbsp;29, 2006 (the &#147;<B>Third Amendment</B>&#148;), as amended by that certain Amendment No.&nbsp;4 to America
West Co-Branded Card Agreement, dated December&nbsp;5, 2007, (the &#147;<B>Fourth Amendment</B>&#148;) and as amended by
that certain Amendment No.&nbsp;5 to America West Co-Branded Card Agreement, dated August&nbsp;28, 2008 (the
&#147;<B>Fifth Amendment</B>&#148; and together with the First Amendment, Second Amendment, Third Amendment, Fourth
Amendment and the Original Agreement, the &#147;<B>Agreement</B>&#148;);
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS, US Airways Group is raising additional capital from its various strategic partners as
part of an overall liquidity program (the &#147;<B>Liquidity Program</B>&#148;) to address current economic
challenges facing the global aviation industry;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS, Juniper Bank has agreed to pre-purchase miles from US Airways Group to assist with
these efforts;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS, Juniper Bank and US Airways Group also desire to offer enhanced benefits to certain
consumer cardholders to increase cardholder spend;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS, US Airways Group and Juniper Bank now desire to amend and modify the Agreement to
incorporate such terms and obligations; and
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS, US Airways Group and Juniper Bank understand and agree that the effectiveness of this
Amendment No.&nbsp;6 and the fulfillment of the respective rights and
</DIV>


<DIV align="left">
<DIV style="font-size: 3pt; margin-top: 16pt; width: 18%; border-top: 1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</DIV>
</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

    <TD width="1%"></TD>

    <TD nowrap align="left">**</TD>

    <TD>Confidential Treatment Requested.</TD>

<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV align="center">
<TABLE style="font-size: 10pt" cellspacing="0" border="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%">

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">obligations contained herein shall be contingent upon consummation of certain conditions of
close with respect to the Liquidity Program as more fully set forth herein.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual covenants contained herein, the parties agree
as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt"><B>1. Definitions</B>. All capitalized terms used herein, but not otherwise defined herein, shall have
the meanings given to such terms in the Agreement.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>2. Amendments</B>.
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">a.</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The following definitions in Section&nbsp;1 of the Agreement are deleted in their
entirety and replaced with the following:</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">&#147;&#147;<B>Early Payment Event</B>&#148; means (i)&nbsp;US Airways Group is in default, with all applicable
cure and grace periods elapsed, of either (A)&nbsp;any material indebtedness for borrowed
money in excess of **, and (ii)&nbsp;the obligations under such material indebtedness for
borrowed money **have been accelerated.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">&#147;<b>Expiration Date</B>&#148; means March&nbsp;31, 2017.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">&#147;<b>Suspension Event</B>&#148; as defined in <U>Section&nbsp;4.6</U>.&#148;
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">b.</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Section&nbsp;1 of the Agreement is amended by adding the following definitions in
the appropriate alphabetical order:</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">&#147;&#147;**<B>Fee</B>&#148; as defined in <U>Section&nbsp;4.2.2</U>.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">&#147;<b>Cap</B>&#148; as defined in <U>Section&nbsp;14.3</U>.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">&#147;<b>Citi Loan</B>&#148; means that certain Loan Agreement dated as of March&nbsp;23, 2007, as
amended, among US Airways Group, certain of its subsidiaries signatory thereto, and
Citicorp North America, Inc., as administrative agent and collateral agent for the
lenders thereunder.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">&#147;<b>Citi Loan Amendment</B>&#148; means an amendment to the Citi Loan providing for, among other
things, the reduction of the Minimum Unrestricted Cash (as defined in the Citi Loan)
on a dollar for dollar basis with certain prepayments from the proceeds from
Liquidity Program until such amount is reduced to $850,000,000.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">&#147;<b>Closing Conditions</B>&#148; as defined in <U>Section&nbsp;14.1</U>.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">&#147;<b>Collateral</B>&#148; shall mean the sum of cash posted directly with US Airways Group&#146;s fuel
hedge counterparties and cash posted to collateralize letters of credit issued for
the benefit of US Airways Groups&#146; fuel hedge counterparties.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">&#147;<b>Conditions Precedent</B>&#148; as defined in <U>Section&nbsp;14.3.1</U>.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left">
<DIV style="font-size: 3pt; margin-top: 16pt; width: 18%; border-top: 1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</DIV>
</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<DIV align="right" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV align="center">
<TABLE style="font-size: 10pt" cellspacing="0" border="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%">
<!-- Begin Table Head -->
<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD width="47%"></TD>
    <TD width="5%"></TD>
    <TD width="47%"></TD>

<!-- Begin Table Body -->
<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD align="left" valign="top"><B>CONFIDENTIAL</B>

    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="right" valign="top"><B>EXECUTION COPY</B></TD>
</TR>
<!-- End Table Body -->

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">&#147;<b>Liquidity Program</B>&#148; as defined in the Recitals of this Amendment No.&nbsp;6.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">&#147;**<B>Fee</B>&#148; as defined in <U>Section&nbsp;4.2.2</U>.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">&#147;<b>Repurchase Commencement Date</B>&#148; as defined in <U>Section&nbsp;14.3</U>.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">&#147;<b>Subsequent Purchase</B>&#148; as defined in <U>Section&nbsp;14.3</U>.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">&#147;<b>Subsequent Purchase Date</B>&#148; as defined in <U>Section&nbsp;14.3</U>.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">&#147;<b>Unrestricted Cash</B>&#148; shall mean the sum of cash, cash equivalents, short-term
investments and available for sale securities (in each case unrestricted) maintained
by US Airways Group as depicted on its balance sheet.&#148;
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">c.</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Section&nbsp;4.2.2 of the Agreement is deleted in its entirety and replaced with the
following:</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#147;4.2.2. <U>Fees</U>.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 6%">(a)&nbsp;During the Term of this Agreement, Juniper Bank shall pay a **fee to US Airways
Group equal to ** for each Base, Bonus or Adjustment Mile awarded by Juniper Bank to an
Account and accounts from **(&#147;**<B>Fee</B>&#148;).
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 6%">(b)&nbsp;In addition to the **Fee, for all Accounts except the accounts from**, Juniper Bank
shall pay a fee for the use of US Airways&#146; Marks, marketing channels, marketing support,
administrative support and brand equity (&#147;**<B>Fee</B>&#148;) as follows:
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">For purposes of this Agreement, (i) &#147;<B>Passenger Enplanements</B>&#148; means the aggregate of
ticketed passengers flown on America West and US Airways branded aircraft as
reported by US Airways for the **period ending **as adjusted for the average
industry capacity reduction over such period of time (for avoidance of doubt, as of
the date of this Agreement, Passenger Enplanements includes passengers flown on Mesa
Airlines or any other carrier operated as America West Express or US Airways Express
but does not include passengers flown on Hawaiian Airlines, except, for example, a
passenger flown on an Albuquerque-Phoenix-Honolulu flight, the Albuquerque-Phoenix
segment of such flight would be included as a Passenger Enplanement), and (ii)
&#147;<B>Active Frequent Flyer</B>&#148; means a US Airways FF Participant who has accrued miles from
flights on America West or US Airways in the **period ending**. The &#147;<B>Passenger
Enplanements Baseline Year&#148; </B>shall be the Passenger Enplanements for the **period
ending **as adjusted for the average industry capacity reduction over such period of
time. The &#147;<B>Active Frequent Flyer Baseline Year</B>&#148; shall be the Active Frequent Flyers
for the **period ending**.&#148;

solicit offers for, supply confidential information for the purpose of evaluating,
or enter into any agreement with respect to**. For purposes of this Agreement, the
term &#147;<B>No-Shop Period</B>&#148; shall mean the period of time commencing on**.

agreement with any person desiring to**. Furthermore, nothing herein shall prevent

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">&#147;14. <U>PRE-PURCHASE OF MILES</U>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">14.1 <U>Pre-Purchase of Miles</U>. Juniper Bank will pre-purchase Miles in an
amount totaling two hundred million dollars ($200,000,000.00) (together with
pre-purchased miles otherwise acquired hereunder, the &#147;<B>Pre-Purchased Miles</B>&#148;) and
wire such funds to an escrow account held by Citi upon notice (the &#147;<B>Pre-Purchase
Date</B>&#148;). The funds will be released upon the satisfaction of the following
conditions (&#147;<B>Closing Conditions</B>&#148;): (i)&nbsp;receipt of requisite lenders consent under
the Citi Loan; (ii)&nbsp;completion of the issuance of additional equity by US Airways
Group in the amount of one hundred seventy-nine million dollars ($179,000,000),
which was completed in August&nbsp;2008; (iii)&nbsp;completion of the refinancing of a portion
of the Citi Loan provided by General Electric and others resulting in, among other
things, a prepayment of the Citi Loan in a minimum amount of four hundred million
dollars ($400,000,000) and the lowering of the
</DIV>


<DIV align="left">
<DIV style="font-size: 3pt; margin-top: 16pt; width: 18%; border-top: 1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</DIV>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">unrestricted cash covenant to eight hundred fifty million dollars ($850,000,000);

be promptly returned to Juniper Bank.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">14.2 <U>Use of Pre-Purchased Miles</U>. Juniper Bank shall use the Pre-Purchased
Miles to compensate US Airways Group for fees otherwise earned hereunder in the
manner and in accordance with the following terms and conditions. In addition, US
Airways shall pay interest on the value of the outstanding Pre-Purchased Miles as
set forth below.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 10%">14.2.1 <U>Payment with Pre-Purchased Miles</U>. Commencing in November,
2008 and in each month thereafter that Juniper Bank holds Pre-Purchased
Miles, it shall compensate US Airways Group for fees earned hereunder with
Pre-Purchased Miles pursuant to the following process: Juniper Bank shall
calculate the amounts due under this Agreement as set forth in <U>Section
4</U> and divide that amount by ** rounded to the nearest whole number to
arrive at the number of Pre-Purchased Miles to be returned to US Airways
Group in lieu of a cash payment as otherwise set forth in <U>Section&nbsp;4</U>.
For avoidance of doubt, the reporting and use of Pre-Purchased Miles as
payment in lieu of cash shall occur within the time frames established in
<U>Sections&nbsp;4.2.3</U> and <U>28</U>.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 10%">14.2.2 <U>Interest Payments</U>. Commencing on the 30<SUP style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-top">th</SUP>
calendar day of the calendar month following the Pre-Purchase Date, and
continuing on the 30<SUP style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-top">th</SUP> calendar day of each calendar month,
except for the month of February where the interest payment shall be due
February&nbsp;28<SUP style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-top">th</SUP>, so long as any Pre-Purchased Miles remain
outstanding, US Airways Group will pay Juniper Bank interest accruing under
the Pre-Purchased Miles at the Adjustable Rate during the preceding Interest
Period. For purposes of this Agreement, &#147;<B>Adjustable Rate</B>&#148; shall mean the
One Month LIBOR on the last business day of each calendar month prior to the
next Interest Period as published on Bloomberg page USSW, plus**. &#147;<B>Interest
Period</B>&#148; shall mean (i)&nbsp;initially, the period beginning on the Pre-Purchase
Date and ending on the last day of the calendar month in which such date
occurs, and (ii)&nbsp;thereafter, the period beginning on the first day of the
calendar month and ending on the last day of such calendar month or the date
on which no Pre-Purchased Miles remain outstanding, as applicable. The
monthly calculation will be as follows: The outstanding dollar amount of
</DIV>


<DIV align="left">
<DIV style="font-size: 3pt; margin-top: 16pt; width: 18%; border-top: 1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</DIV>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 10%">the Pre-Purchased Miles held by Juniper Bank on the last day of the
preceding month times (Adjustable Rate/360 times the number of calendar days
in the Interest Period).
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="6%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">14.3</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><U>Subsequent Monthly Purchase</U>. Commencing in November,
2008 for each month in which the Conditions Precedent as set forth in
<U>Section&nbsp;14.3.1</U> are met, Juniper Bank shall purchase additional
Pre-Purchased Miles in an amount equal to the difference between the Cap (as
defined below) and the amount of unused Pre-Purchased Miles (each a &#147;<B>Subsequent
Purchase</B>&#148;). Each Subsequent Purchase shall occur no later than the ** calendar
day of the month following the month in which the Conditions Precedent are
measured (the &#147;<B>Subsequent Purchase Date</B>&#148;). Prior to the **of the Pre-Purchase
Date (the &#147;<B>Repurchase Commencement Date</B>&#148;), in each month in which the
Conditions Precedent are not met, the Cap shall be reduced by**. Commencing on
the Repurchase Commencement Date, the Cap shall be reduced by ** each month in
which the Conditions Precedent are met and ** in each month the Conditions
Precedent are not met until such time no Pre-Purchased Miles remain
outstanding. For purposes of this Agreement, the initial &#147;<B>Cap</B>&#148; shall be $200
million and will reduce accordingly as set forth above. Subsequent Purchases
that occur in February shall occur on the later of February&nbsp;28 or three (3)
business days after receipt of the Report(s) due pursuant to Section&nbsp;17.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 10%">14.3.1 <U>Conditions Precedent</U>. Juniper Bank&#146;s obligations to make a
Subsequent Purchase each month pursuant to <U>Section&nbsp;14.3</U> will only
arise upon and are subject to the satisfaction or waiver of the following
conditions (&#147;<B>Conditions Precedent</B>&#148;) each month prior to the month in which
the Subsequent Purchase is to be made:
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="16%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">(i)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>US Airways Group&#146;s Unrestricted
Cash shall be equal to or greater than $1.5&nbsp;billion as measured
at the end of each month <U>and</U> **pre-tax income (excluding
special items) measured **is less than**. For the purposes of
this <U>Section&nbsp;14.3.1(i)</U>, the calculation of Unrestricted
Cash will include Collateral for fuel hedge contracts**. By way
of example, if October is being measured for November&#146;s
Subsequent Purchase, US Airways Group&#146;s Unrestricted Cash
(including the fuel hedge contracts) will be measured as of
October&nbsp;31<SUP style="font-size: 85%; vertical-align: text-top">st</SUP>**.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="16%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>If US Airways Group&#146;s Unrestricted Cash falls below $1.5
billion in any monthbut the **pre-tax income test is met,
then Juniper Bank will be required to purchase the additional
Pre-Purchased Miles for such month**.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>

    <TD>No Suspension Event has occurred
in the month being measured.</TD>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">14.4 <U>Prepayment</U>. US Airways Group may repurchase all or any of the
Pre-Purchased Miles at any time, or from time to time, without penalty or premium.
Any prepayment shall include accrued interest, if any, in accordance with
<U>Section&nbsp;14.2.2</U>.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">14.5 <U>Acceptance of Payment with Pre-Purchased Miles</U>. US Airways Group
agrees to accept payment in Pre-Purchased Miles as provided in this <U>Section
14</U> in lieu of cash and irrevocably waives any rights to receive cash or other
consideration for such payments regardless of the then value of a Pre-Purchased
Mile.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">14.6 <U>Other Uses of Pre-Purchased Miles.</U> To the extent Juniper Bank uses
Pre-Purchased Miles for purposes other than as set forth in <U>Sections&nbsp;14.2</U>
through <U>14.6</U>, US Airways Group shall provide commercially reasonable methods
to redeem said Pre-Purchased Miles (e.g., mileage certificates or assignment to FF
Accounts) to facilitate the use of the Pre-Purchased Miles by Juniper Bank and/or
the recipient of said Pre-Purchased Miles. This obligation shall survive
termination of this Agreement.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 8%">14.7 <U>Transportation Tax</U>. Juniper Bank&#146;s obligation to fund the
Transportation Tax, as set forth in <U>Section&nbsp;4.8</U>, shall not occur with
respect to Pre-Purchased Miles unless and until Juniper Bank awards such
Pre-Purchased Miles to Affinity Cardholders and/or others such that the recipient
may use such Pre-Purchased Miles for redemption for air travel<I>.</I>&#148;
</DIV>


<DIV align="left">
<DIV style="font-size: 3pt; margin-top: 16pt; width: 18%; border-top: 1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 6%">US Airways Group shall make available to Juniper Bank the following reports: (i)&nbsp;annual
audited financials statements within 105&nbsp;days after the end of each fiscal year and
unaudited quarterly financial statements within 60&nbsp;days after the end of each fiscal
quarter; provided that the filing of such reports on EDGAR shall satisfy the delivery
obligations hereunder; (ii)&nbsp;annual financial plans and monthly projections for the
following year as soon as practicable after preparation thereof in the ordinary course
of business but in no event later than February&nbsp;28 of each year; (iii)&nbsp;monthly income
statements and balance sheet results in a format consistent with Securities Exchange
Commission standards within 45&nbsp;days following the close of each month; (iv)&nbsp;within 25
days after the end of each month, a monthly attestation from US Airways Group that the
Conditions Precedent were met as of the end of the then ended month**; and (v)&nbsp;quarterly
certificate of compliance with <U>Section&nbsp;4.6</U> including reporting of Active
Frequent Flyers and Passenger Enplanements as well as the baseline Active Frequent
Flyers and baseline Passenger Enplanements within thirty (30)&nbsp;days following the end of
each quarter. In addition, US Airways Group agrees to participate in quarterly calls
with Juniper Bank&#146;s Chief Financial Officer and/or Chief Risk Officer; provided that
each quarter Juniper Bank desires to have such a call, it will provide US Airways Group
with prior notice.&#148;
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt"><B>3. Effectiveness</B>. This Amendment No.&nbsp;6 shall become effective at the Effective Time, it being
understood that if the Effective Time does not occur before October&nbsp;31, 2008, this Amendment No.&nbsp;6
shall have no force and effect and shall be null and void for all purposes with the Agreement
reverting back to the previous status quo without any further action by either party. For purposes
of this Amendment No.&nbsp;6, the &#147;<B>Effective Time</B>&#148; means the date and time that all of the Closing
Conditions are satisfied.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt"><B>4. Effect</B>. Except as set forth in this Amendment No.&nbsp;6, the Agreement shall remain in full force
and effect and each of US Airways Group and Juniper Bank hereby restates and affirms all
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt"><B>5. Entire Agreement</B>. The Agreement, as amended by this Amendment No.&nbsp;6, constitutes the entire

understandings with respect thereto.

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt"><B>6. Counterparts</B>. This Amendment No.&nbsp;6 may be executed in any number of counterparts, each of which
shall be deemed an original and all of which when taken together shall constitute one and the same
instrument. Delivery of an executed counterpart signature page by facsimile shall be effective as
a manually executed signature page.

</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->- iv -<!-- /Folio -->

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">




<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt"><FONT style="font-variant: SMALL-CAPS"><B>Loan Agreement &#091;Spare Parts&#093;</B></FONT>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;THIS LOAN AGREEMENT &#091;SPARE PARTS&#093;, dated as of October&nbsp;20, 2008 (this &#147;<U>Agreement</U>&#148;), is
among US AIRWAYS, INC., a Delaware corporation (the &#147;<U>Borrower</U>&#148;), GENERAL ELECTRIC CAPITAL
CORPORATION, a Delaware corporation, as Administrative Agent for the Lenders (the
&#147;<U>Administrative Agent</U>&#148;), GENERAL ELECTRIC CAPITAL CORPORATION, a Delaware corporation, as
the Collateral Agent (the &#147;<U>Collateral Agent</U>&#148;), GENERAL ELECTRIC CAPITAL CORPORATION (herein
called the &#147;<I>Original Lender</I>&#148;), and such other lenders as may from time to time be party hereto
(together with the Original Lender, the &#147;<U>Lenders</U>&#148;). Certain capitalized terms used herein
are defined, and certain rules of construction are specified, in Schedule&nbsp;1.
</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt"><FONT style="font-variant: SMALL-CAPS"><B>Background</B></FONT>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;l.&nbsp;The Lenders have agreed to make loans to the Borrower to be secured by a Lien on certain
spare parts and related property owned by the Borrower and stored at certain locations.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.&nbsp;In connection with such loans, the parties hereto wish to enter into certain related
understandings, as set forth herein.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The parties hereto agree as follows:
</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt"><FONT style="font-variant: SMALL-CAPS"><B>Article&nbsp;I</B></FONT><BR>
<FONT style="font-variant: SMALL-CAPS"><B>The Loan</B></FONT>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<I>Section&nbsp;1.1. The Loan.</I>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;<I>Commitments</I>. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Loan Agreement, on the Funding
Date, each Lender shall advance funds in an amount equal to its Percentage Share of the Maximum
Facility Amount; provided that no Lender shall have any obligation to advance funds in excess of
the amount of its Commitment. As evidence of the funds advanced by each Lender, on the Funding
Date the Borrower shall issue and deliver to each Lender, as provided hereunder, a Note payable to
such Lender in an original principal amount equal to the amount of such Lender&#146;s Percentage Share
of the Loan. The Notes and the Collateral Agent&#146;s certificate of authentication thereon shall each
be substantially in the form set forth in <U>Exhibit&nbsp;B</U>.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;<I>The Notes; Amortization. </I>The Loan shall mature on the Maturity Date, and the principal of
the Loan shall be payable **installments in the amount set forth in Part&nbsp;1 of Schedule&nbsp;2 to this
Agreement with respect to each Payment Date; provided, however, **installments in the amount forth
in Part&nbsp;2 of Schedule&nbsp;2 to this Agreement with respect to each Payment Date; <I>provided </I>that, in the
event that the Loan shall have been prepaid in part pursuant hereto (other than pursuant to Section
1.1(e) hereof), from and after the date of the relevant prepayment, the amounts of such
installments shall be reduced, **, by the amount of such partial prepayment. Annex A to each Note
shall be completed so that the aggregate amount of principal due on each Payment Date on all of the
Notes, taken together, is equal to the amount of principal due on such Payment Date as set forth on
Part&nbsp;1 of Schedule&nbsp;2, and, in the event that the Borrower makes the prepayment contemplated by
Section&nbsp;1.1(e) hereof, then, upon request by
</DIV>


<DIV align="left">
<DIV style="font-size: 3pt; margin-top: 16pt; width: 18%; border-top: 1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</DIV>
</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">
<TR>
    <TD width="3%"></TD>
    <TD width="1%"></TD>
    <TD width="96"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD nowrap align="left">**</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Confidential Treatment Requested.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>



<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio --> 1 <!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">the Borrower, the Lenders shall surrender their Notes for replacement Notes which reflect the
revised Maturity Date and amortization schedule provided for by the terms of this Agreement
following such prepayment by the Borrower. In the case of each Note, each payment of the principal
amount, **, and interest or other amounts due thereon shall be applied, **, if any, and to the
extent permitted by law, **, <U>second</U>, to the payment of accrued interest on the Loan to the
date of such payment, <U>third</U>, to the payment of**, due hereunder in respect of the Loan, and
<U>fourth</U>, the balance, if any, remaining thereafter, to the payment of the principal amount
of the Loan remaining unpaid**.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;**<I>.</I>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 2%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<I>(i)&nbsp;In General. </I>**, on any Business Day (a &#147;<U>Prepayment Date</U>&#148;), on not less than
three (3)&nbsp;Business Days&#146; prior irrevocable written notice from the Borrower to the
Administrative Agent, the Borrower may prepay all, or any portion of the outstanding
principal amount of the Loan without premium or penalty; provided, however, that no partial
prepayment of the Loan shall be for less than **of principal. If the Borrower elects to
prepay the Loan in whole or in part, the Borrower shall pay on the Prepayment Date to the
Administrative Agent, for the account of the Lenders, the principal amount specified to be
prepaid in the applicable notice of prepayment together with all accrued and unpaid interest
thereon, **, and all other amounts then due and payable under the Transaction Documents.
**
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 2%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<I>(ii) **</I>, in the event that the Borrower receives notice from any Lender of any costs
that the Borrower is required to pay to such Lender pursuant to any of Sections&nbsp;5.1, 5.2 or
5.3 and the Lender is not able to mitigate the relevant costs by changing its Lending Office
pursuant to Section&nbsp;1.10 below, then the Borrower shall have the right, exercisable upon not
less than ten Business Days&#146; prior notice to the applicable Lender (with a copy to the
Administrative Agent), to prepay in full the Loan Amount held by such Lender, without
premium or penalty. If the Borrower elects to make such a prepayment, then the Borrower
shall pay the full Loan Amount held by the applicable Lender, together with accrued interest
thereon, **and any amounts due to such Lender pursuant to Sections&nbsp;5.1, 5.2 and 5.3, as
applicable. Any prepayment by the Borrower pursuant to this Section&nbsp;1.1(c)(ii) shall be
made by the Borrower directly to the applicable Lender, and no prepayment by the Borrower
pursuant to this Section&nbsp;1.1(c)(ii) shall have any effect on the Borrower&#146;s obligations with
respect to the remaining outstanding balance of the Loan to any of the other Lenders
hereunder. For the avoidance of doubt such prepayment may be made prior to the Designated
Date and may be in an amount less than**.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)&nbsp;** In the event that, in accordance with Section&nbsp;3.03 of the Mortgage, the Borrower is
entitled to make, and elects to make, a prepayment of the Loan, then the principal amount of such
prepayment, together with accrued interest thereon to the date of such prepayment, **, shall be
paid, without premium or penalty, by the Borrower to the Administrative Agent for the account of
all Lenders. Any prepayment pursuant to this Section&nbsp;1.1(d) shall be applied to principal**. For
the avoidance of doubt such prepayment may be made prior to the Designated Date and may be in an
amount less than**.
</DIV>

<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(e)&nbsp;** In the event that the Borrower makes the prepayment contemplated by this Section
1.1(e), then the schedule for the payment of the remaining outstanding principal balance of the
Loan shall be as set forth in Part&nbsp;2 of Schedule&nbsp;2.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In order to raise the funds for such prepayment, the Borrower shall have the right (but not
the obligation) to sell or finance to a third party**; <I>provided</I>, that the foregoing shall not
prohibit Borrower from using such **following the sale thereof. For the avoidance of doubt,
however, in connection with any Special Prepayment, (i)&nbsp;any and all sold Spare Parts may remain at
Designated Locations so long as such Spare Parts are, promptly following the closing of the sale,
segregated from the Pledged Spare Parts in the manner contemplated by the Mortgage with respect to
Excluded Parts, and Borrower otherwise complies with its obligations under the Mortgage with
respect to the remaining Collateral, and (ii)&nbsp;Borrower may not refinance the Loan in any
transaction in which a lien on any portion of the Pledged Spare Parts (excluding the **released
from the Collateral as a result of the Special Prepaymant) or other Collateral is granted to a
party other than Collateral Agent, regardless of whether such other lien is senior or junior to the
liens in favor of Collateral Agent. Upon receipt by the Administrative Agent of the full principal
amount to be prepaid as contemplated by this Section&nbsp;1.1(e), together with accrued interest**, and
without regard to the source of such funds used to make the Special Prepayment, then all of the
Pledged Spare Parts that are **shall be released from the Lien of the Mortgage and the Subordinated
Parts Mortgage so long as the remaining Pledged Spare Parts, after giving effect to such release
(and any cure pursuant to Section&nbsp;3.03 of the Mortgage), will satisfy each of the Collateral Value
Tests, in each case as measured as of the date when the **are to be released, but based on the
Current Market Value of such Pledged Spare Parts as of the most recent Valuation Date.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(f)&nbsp;<I>Pro Rata Treatment. </I>Except to the extent otherwise provided herein (including, but not
limited to, as otherwise specified in Section&nbsp;1.1(c)(ii) above): (a)&nbsp;the borrowing of the Loan
from the Lenders under Section&nbsp;1.2 shall be made from the Lenders pro rata according to the amounts
of their respective Commitments; (b)&nbsp;each payment or prepayment of principal of the Loan shall be
made for account of the Lenders pro rata in accordance with the respective unpaid principal amounts
of the Loan held by them (as evidenced by the Notes held by them); and (c)&nbsp;each payment of interest
on the Loan shall be made for account of the Lenders pro rata in accordance with the amounts of
interest on the Loan then due and payable to the Lenders, but must in all respects comply with the
terms of the Mortgage.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<I>Section&nbsp;1.2. Making the Loan.</I>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;The Loan shall be requested by the delivery of a Notice of Borrowing by the Borrower to
the Administrative Agent not later than 4:00 p.m. (New York City time) on the second Business Day
prior to the Funding Date specified in such notice. The Administrative Agent shall give to each
Lender prompt notice thereof. The Notice of Borrowing shall be irrevocable and binding on the
Borrower. The Notice of Borrowing shall be in writing specifying therein (i)&nbsp;the aggregate amount
of the Loan to be funded, and (ii)&nbsp;the proposed Funding Date. Each Lender shall, before 10:00&nbsp;a.m.
(New York City time) on the scheduled
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->- 3 -<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 10pt">Funding Date, make available for the account of its Lending Office to the Administrative
Agent&#146;s Account, in immediately available funds, the amount of its Commitment. After the
Administrative Agent&#146;s receipt of such funds and upon fulfillment of the applicable conditions set
forth in Article&nbsp;VI as confirmed during a closing conference call pursuant to which the
Administrative Agent or its counsel shall indicate such fulfillment, the Administrative Agent shall
transfer such funds to the escrow account at**.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;If for any reason a Closing is not consummated on the Funding Date set forth in the Notice
of Borrowing, the Borrower may, by written notice to the Administrative Agent given by 5:00&nbsp;p.m.,
New York City time on the scheduled Funding Date, designate a delayed Funding Date for such
Closing, in which case the Administrative Agent shall hold the funds provided by the Lenders until
such delayed Funding Date and use reasonable efforts to invest such funds in Permitted Investments,
as directed by the Borrower, <I>provided</I>, that if such Closing does not occur by the third Business
Day after such initial scheduled Funding Date, such funds shall be returned to the Lenders. The
Administrative Agent shall pay to the Borrower upon its request any earnings from such investments,
and the Borrower shall pay to the Administrative Agent upon its request any losses from such
investments. If the Closing fails to occur on a scheduled or delayed Funding Date and the Borrower
does not give notice of a delayed Funding Date pursuant to this Section, the Administrative Agent
shall promptly return to the Lenders the amounts funded by them and the Borrower shall pay to the
Lenders upon demand **with respect to amounts funded plus, in the case of failure to close on a
delayed Funding Date, interest from and including the initial scheduled Funding Date to but
excluding the date on which such funds are returned by 1:00 p.m. (New York City time) (or, if
returned after such time on such date, to but excluding the next Business Day), at a rate per annum
equal to the relevant Interest Rate that would have been applicable thereto had the Closing
occurred on the initial scheduled Funding Date. If the Borrower has designated a delayed Funding
Date pursuant to this Section and the Closing occurs on such delayed Funding Date, the Loan shall
begin to accrue interest at the relevant Interest Rate on the date that funds were originally
provided by the Lenders to the Administrative Agent to make the Loan (which shall be deemed to be
the commencement date of the initial Interest Period for the Loan); provided, however, if all
conditions precedent specified in Article&nbsp;VI are satisfied in full on or before the initial
scheduled Funding Date and the Closing does not occur on the initial scheduled Funding Date solely
due to the failure of the Lenders to fund the Loan pursuant to their respective Commitments
hereunder (but the Closing does occur later pursuant to this Section&nbsp;1.2(b)), then the Loan shall
begin to accrue interest only on the date that the Closing actually occurs (rather than from the
initial scheduled Funding Date).
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<I>Section&nbsp;1.3. **</I>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<I>Section&nbsp;1.4. Commitment Termination. </I>The Commitment of each Lender shall terminate on the
earlier of (i)&nbsp;the making of the Loan pursuant to Section&nbsp;1.2(a) above, or (ii)&nbsp;at 5:00 p.m. (New
York time) on the Commitment Termination Date.
</DIV>

<P><HR noshade><P>
